name: Rampart
description:
Reduces damage suffered by the caster and their allies in an area of effect around the caster.
The protection is higher on the caster.

name: Fortification
description: Reduces damage suffered by the targeted ally.

name: Natural Attack
description: Steals Intelligence and inflicts Fire damage.

name: Natural Attraction
description: Inflicts Fire damage on enemies and attracts the target.

name: Blindness
description:
Removes AP and inflicts Neutral damage in an area of effect.
Does not affect the caster.

name: Dazzling
description: Attracts targets towards the centre and inflicts Earth damage on enemies in an area of effect around the caster.

name: Typhoon
description: Steals Agility and inflicts Air damage in an area of effect.

name: Gust
description: Inflicts Air damage on enemies and repels targets outwards in an area of effect.

name: Bubble
description: Inflicts Water damage and reduces Range.

name: Swelling
description: Inflicts Air damage on enemies and repels the target.

name: Barricade
description:
Makes the targeted ally Invulnerable to close-combat damage.
For 1 turn, if they receive ranged damage, increases their MP.

Removes the effects of the Bastion spell on the targeted ally.

name: Pavise
description:
Summons a static shield Invulnerable to ranged damage.
This shield is destroyed on the caster's next turn.

name: Aggressive Glyph
description:
Places a start-of-turn glyph that attracts targets towards its centre and inflicts Air damage on enemies.
Reduces the damage inflicted by the entities present in the glyph.

Prevents the use of other elemental glyphs in the same turn.

name: Fulminating Glyph
description:
Inflicts Air damage on enemies and places a glyph-aura under the target that increases allies' close-combat damage.

Prevents the use of other elemental glyphs in the same turn.

name: Lethargy
description: Inflicts Fire damage and reduces MP.

name: Lifelessness
description: Steals Intelligence and inflicts Fire damage.

name: Cloudy Attack
description: Steals Chance and inflicts Water damage.

name: Stormy Attack
description:
Inflicts Water damage and reduces the chance of inflicting critical hits in an area of effect.
Does not affect the caster.

name: Bastion
description:
Makes the targeted ally Invulnerable to ranged damage.
For 1 turn, if they receive close-combat damage, increases their Power.

Removes the effects of the Barricade spell on the targeted ally.

name: Manoeuvre
description: Switches places with the target.

name: Backlash
description: Steals Strength and inflicts Earth damage.

name: Tetany
description: Inflicts Neutral damage and removes AP.

name: Teleglyph
description: Teleports the caster and triggers their glyph-auras on the targeted cell.

name: Aegis
description:
Summons a static shield that suffers damage instead of allies present in its glyph-aura.
This shield is destroyed 2 turns after being summoned.

name: Repulsion Glyph
description: Places an end-of-turn glyph that inflicts Fire, Water, Earth and Air damage.

name: Barrier
description:
Places a glyph around the targeted enemy and applies the Gravity state to them at the start of their next turn.
The glyph inflicts Fire, Water, Earth and Air damage on the enemy if they go through it but removes the Gravity state.

name: Truce
description:
Reduces all damage suffered by everyone.
Makes the caster Pacifist for the following turn only.

name: Backup
description: Teleports the caster to the first cell available between the targeted ally and the caster.

name: Blinding Glyph
description:
Places a start-of-turn glyph that inflicts Earth damage on enemies.
Removes AP from entities present in the glyph.

Prevents the use of other elemental glyphs in the same turn.

name: Protective Glyph
description:
Inflicts Earth damage on enemies and places a glyph-aura under the target that reduces damage suffered by allies.

Prevents the use of other elemental glyphs in the same turn.

name: Shiver
description: Inflicts Air damage on enemies and repels targets in an area of effect.

name: Tension
description: Inflicts Water damage on enemies and repels the target.

name: Paralysing Glyph
description:
Places a start-of-turn glyph that inflicts Water damage on enemies.
Reduces the Range of entities inside the glyph.

Prevents the use of other elemental glyphs in the same turn.

name: Roaming Glyph
description:
Inflicts Water damage on enemies and places a glyph-aura under the target that increases allies' Dodge.

Prevents the use of other elemental glyphs in the same turn.

name: Torpor
description: Steals Dodge and inflicts Earth damage.

name: Lateral Flame
description: Inflicts Fire damage on enemies and attracts targets towards the centre in an area of effect.

name: Reinforced Protection
description:
Increases the Power of Glyphs and the caster's Power.
Applies the Glyphorce state to the caster, forbidding use of Feca protection spells.
Removes the effects of Feca protection spells on allies and kills the caster's Aegis.

name: Ataraxia
description:
Applies the Gravity state on the targeted ally and reduces all types of damage suffered on the first attack.
The effects of the spell are removed if the ally suffers damage.

Interception and damage-sharing effects are incompatible with the spell.
The effects cannot be unbewitched.

name: Gravitational Glyph
description: Places a glyph-aura that applies the Unshakable and Gravity states.

name: Excursion Glyph
description: Places a glyph-aura that switches the allies' places with the caster's.

name: Burning Glyph
description:
Places a start-of-turn glyph that inflicts Fire damage on enemies.
Removes MP from entities present in the glyph.

Prevents the use of other elemental glyphs in the same turn.

name: Perception Glyph
description:
Inflicts Fire damage on enemies and places a glyph-aura under the caster that increases allies' Range.

Prevents the use of other elemental glyphs in the same turn.

name: Feca Shield
description: Reduces the target's damage suffered.

name: Inertia
description:
Applies the Gravity state in an area of effect and increases the caster's Lock for each enemy in the area of effect.
The Gravity state does not affect the caster.

name: Dragonic
description:
Inflicts Fire damage in an area of effect.

Gives a Wyrmlicharge if an entity is hit.

name: Sparkmeleon
description:
Inflicts Fire damage on enemies or heals allies.

Gives a Wyrmlicharge (requires a target).

name: Geyser
description:
Inflicts Water damage.

Gives a Toacharge (requires a target).

name: Aquaculture
description:
Inflicts Water damage on enemies in an area of effect.
Spreads to enemies adjacent to the targets. May rebound on the caster's Toads without the Toads suffering damage.

Gives a Toacharge if an enemy or one of the caster's Toads is hit.

name: First
description:
Consumes summoning charges to summon a biddable creature chosen based on the charge's element and power.

This spell's cooldown period starts when the summons dies and recasting this spell before then moves and then immobilises the summons. Moving multiple summons during the same turn costs 1 AP more each time. The Noformo is always controllable.

name: Favouritism
description:
Applies the Favourite state to one of the caster's Tofus, Gobballs, Toads or Wyrmlings. The favourite Summons gains a damage suffered reduction that is updated at the end of each of the caster's turns based on the caster's total number of Tofus, Gobballs, Toads or Wyrmlings.

The favourite Summons also gains 15% damage (6 turns) at the start of each turn.

Gives a 40/25/15/10/5% reduction when the caster has 1/2/3/4/5 Tofu, Gobball, Toad or Wyrmling Summons.

name: Canine
description:
Inflicts Air damage.
Reduces enemies' Lock.

Gives a Tofucharge (requires a target).

name: Repulsive Fang
description:
Inflicts Air damage on enemies and repels the target.

Gives a Tofucharge (requires a target).

name: Fossil
description:
Inflicts Earth damage.
Removes MP from enemies.

Gives a Gobbacharge (requires a target).

name: Sedimentation
description:
Inflicts Earth damage and removes Power from enemies.

Gives a Gobbacharge (requires a target).

name: Protective Balm
description:
Gives one of the caster's summons a shield immediately and refreshes it on each of the summons's turns until the summons dies or the spell is cast on another summons.

The effect is transmitted when the Noformo transforms.

name: Fourth
description:
Consumes summoning charges to summon a biddable creature chosen based on the charge's element and power.

This spell's cooldown period starts when the summons dies and recasting this spell before then moves and then immobilises the summons. Moving multiple summons during the same turn costs 1 AP more each time. The Noformo is always controllable.

name: Puncture
description: Gives a summoning charge based on the family of one of the caster's Osamodas summons.

name: Beastly Balance
description:
Changes the summoning charge family based on the current family: Tofu -> Gobball -> Toad -> Wyrmling -> Tofu.
The spell's AP cost is reimbursed on the first casting.

name: Aquatic Wave
description:
Inflicts Water damage on enemies.
Increases the damage from summons suffered by the targeted enemy.

Gives a Toacharge (requires a target).

name: Scalding Poison
description:
Applies a start-of-turn Water poison on the target.
Attacking the target with a Toad inflicts Water damage prematurely.

The effects are not applied on the Noformo.

Gives a Toacharge (requires a target).

name: Flaming Crow
description:
Inflicts Fire damage.
The spell's damage, minimum range and maximum range are increased after each casting for the current turn.

Gives a Wyrmlicharge (requires a target).

name: Cross Scale
description:
Inflicts Fire damage on enemies and heals allies in an area of effect.
Does not affect the caster.

Gives a Wyrmlicharge if an enemy is hit.
Gives a Wyrmlicharge if an ally is hit.

name: Second
description:
Consumes summoning charges to summon a biddable creature chosen based on the charge's element and power.

This spell's cooldown period starts when the summons dies and recasting this spell before then moves and then immobilises the summons. Moving multiple summons during the same turn costs 1 AP more each time. The Noformo is always controllable.

name: Natural Defence
description:
Makes one of the caster's Osamodas summons Invulnerable.

The effect is transmitted when the Noformo transforms.

name: Duster
description:
Inflicts Air damage.

Cast on one of the caster's Tofus: returns 3 AP and increases the spell's damage the next time it is used offensively during the current turn.

Gives a Tofucharge (requires a target, excluding the caster's Tofus).

name: Plucking
description:
Places a single-cell trap that inflicts Air damage on enemies in a 2-cell area of effect if one of the caster's Tofus triggers it.

Gives a Tofucharge if it is triggered by one of the caster's Tofus.

name: Crackler Punch
description:
Inflicts Earth damage on enemies in an area of effect.

Gives a Gobbacharge if at least one enemy is hit.
Gives a second Gobbacharge if at least three enemies are hit.

name: Constriction
description:
Steals HP in the Earth element

Gives a Gobbacharge (requires a target).

name: Animal Blessing
description: Gives 3 summoning charges in the current family of charges.

name: Replacement
description: Replaces one of your Tofus, Gobballs, Toads or Wyrmlings with a new, identical Summons with all alterations removed. The more the replaced Summons is damaged, the more the replacement Summons gains a high Vitality bonus (from +10% to +100%).

name: High-Energy Shot
description:
Considerably increases the Vitality, damage, MP and AP of one of the caster's summons for 1 turn, then indefinitely with lower values.

A summons may only receive the shot once.

name: Fifth
description:
Consumes summoning charges to summon a biddable creature chosen based on the charge's element and power.

This spell's cooldown period starts when the summons dies and recasting this spell before then moves and then immobilises the summons. Moving multiple summons during the same turn costs 1 AP more each time. The Noformo is always controllable.

name: Dragon's Breath
description:
Repels adjacent entities (except for the caster) from the team opposite that of the target.
Inflicts Fire damage on enemies or heals allies.

Gives a Wyrmlicharge (requires a target).

name: Dragon Heart
description:
Inflicts Fire damage on enemies and heals allies in a 2-cell area of effect around the caster's Wyrmlings.
Healing is reduced by half on the caster.

Gives a Wyrmlicharge.

name: Woolly Sledgehammer
description:
Inflicts Earth damage.
Inflicts less Earth damage the second time on the same target during the current turn but removes Dodge from the target.

Gives a Gobbacharge (requires a target).

name: Gobball Fleece
description:
Applies shield points per enemy hit on allies and inflicts Earth damage on enemies in an area of effect.

Gives a Gobbacharge if an enemy is hit.

name: Takeoff
description:
Switches places with one of the caster's Osamodas summons to inflict Air damage on enemies in a 2-cell area of effect around the caster and the summons.
The damage is applied only once per casting if the position swap is possible.

Gives a Tofucharge if an enemy is hit.

name: Gambol
description:
Teleports the caster symmetrically in relation to the target and inflicts Air damage on enemies.

Gives a Tofucharge (requires a target).

name: Third
description:
Consumes summoning charges to summon a biddable creature chosen based on the charge's element and power.

This spell's cooldown period starts when the summons dies and recasting this spell before then moves and then immobilises the summons. Moving multiple summons during the same turn costs 1 AP more each time. The Noformo is always controllable.

name: Relay
description:
Links the targeted ally to the caster's summons closest to the ally:
• Increases the targeted ally's AP.
• Switches the position of two entities if they are within 5 cells or less from each other.

The effects dissipate on the death of the summons or ally.
The link cannot be applied to an ally or summons under the effects of the spell.

If the targeted ally is a summons, increases the spell's cooldown period.

name: Whirlwind
description:
Inflicts Water damage on enemies.

On a caster's Toad: inflicts Water damage on enemies in an area of effect. The area of effect depends on the Toad:
• Melanic: 1-cell cross
• Albino: 1-cell square
• Verdant: 2-cell circle

Gives a Toacharge (requires a target).

name: Batra
description:
Inflicts Water damage on enemies in a 2-cell area of effect around the caster and their Toads.
Applies a start-of-turn Water poison on enemies if they are in the area of effect of the caster and a Toad, or of two Toads.
The effects are applied only once per casting.

Gives a Toacharge.

name: Animal Tandem
description:
Gives a bonus to the targeted ally and the caster based on the last summoning charge gained. Each effect stacks one time.

• Tofucharge: MP and Dodge
• Gobbacharge: shield points
• Toacharge: Power
• Wyrmlicharge: increase in healing received

name: Nature Preserve
description: Increases the MP of all the caster's Osamodas summons.

name: Whip
description:
Attracts the caster's Osamodas summons towards the centre of the area of effect.
If the cell is occupied, teleports the Osamodas summons symmetrically in relation to the target.

name: Crop
description:
Applies movement effects based on the number of summoning charges and their family.

• Tofucharge: pushes the target back 1 to 3 cells
• Gobbocharge: attracts the target by 1 to 3 cells
• Toacharge: moves the caster closer by 1 to 3 cells
• Wyrmlicharge: moves the caster away by 1 to 3 cells

name: Call to Order
description:
Kills an allied Summons.
If it's one of the caster's Tofus, Gobballs, Toads or Wyrmlings, grants one summoning charge based on the summons's family and returns 3 AP to the caster before killing the summons.

name: Sixth
description:
Consumes summoning charges to summon a biddable creature chosen based on the charge's element and power.

This spell's cooldown period starts when the summons dies and recasting this spell before then moves and then immobilises the summons. Moving multiple summons during the same turn costs 1 AP more each time. The Noformo is always controllable.

name: Coin Throwing
description: Inflicts Water damage.

name: Placer Mining
description:
Inflicts Water damage.

For 2 turns, inflicts Water damage if the target suffers an attempted MP reduction.
May be triggered 3 times per turn.

name: Mound
description:
Inflicts Earth damage in an area of effect. 
Does not affect the caster.

name: Peat Bog
description:
Inflicts Earth damage in an area of effect.
Inflicts additional Earth damage in an area of effect based on the caster's MP: the fewer MP the caster has used during their turn, the greater the additional damage.

name: Living Bag
description:
Summons a biddable Living Bag that suffers damage on behalf of its allies located in its summoning zone.
The Living Bag disappears 3 turns after it was summoned.
When attacked by an ally, the ally is healed.

name: Living Satchel
description:
Summons a biddable Living Satchel that heals and shares damage among all allies in its summoning zone.
The Living Satchel disappears 2 turns after it was summoned.
When attacked by an ally, the ally is healed.

name: Shovel Kiss
description: Inflicts Fire damage.

name: Deposit
description: Inflicts Fire damage on enemies and heals allies in an area of effect at the end of their turns.

name: Opportuneness
description: Inflicts Air damage and increases the caster's Power.

name: Loafylactic
description: Inflicts Air damage and removes AP.

name: Acceleration
description: Increases the targeted ally's MP.

name: Wandering
description: Reduces the duration of the target's effects and switches its position with the caster's Living Bag or Living Satchel.

name: Pandora's Box
description: Heals all allies but increases the MP of all enemies.

name: Toolbox
description:
Increases the targeted ally's AP and MP but makes the ally Pacifist.
If the ally is not a summons, also makes all the ally's summons Pacifist.

name: Prime of Life
description: Inflicts Earth damage and gives the caster 1 MP.

name: Mine Fire
description:
Inflicts Fire damage.
Entities that attack the target are healed by some of the damage inflicted.

name: Treasure Key
description:
Reduces enemies' Range or increases allies' Range.
The bonus is halved on the caster.

name: Armlock
description: Heals the target but removes 1 unparryable MP.

name: Auriferous Shovel
description: Inflicts Water damage and removes MP.

name: Shovel Throwing
description: Inflicts Earth damage and reduces Range.

name: Living Shovel
description:
Summons a biddable Living Shovel that pushes its targets.
When attacked by an ally, the ally is healed.

name: Living Spade
description:
Summons a biddable Living Spade that steals HP in the Air element.
When it is attacked by an ally, the ally is healed.

name: Greed
description: Removes Power from everyone and increases the caster's Power for each entity hit.

name: Miserliness
description: Removes unparryable MP but increases AP in an area of effect. Does not affect the caster.

name: Ghostly Shovel
description: Reduces the duration of the target's effects and inflicts Fire damage on enemies.

name: Spade of the Ancients
description: Inflicts Air damage on enemies and pushes targets back from the centre of the area of effect.

name: Clumsiness
description: Subtracts MP.

name: Golden Age
description:
Makes the targeted ally Unlockable.
Increases its Power on the following turn.

name: Collapse
description:
Inflicts Earth damage.

For 2 turns, inflicts Earth damage if the target suffers a Range reduction.
May be triggered 3 times per turn.

name: Hard Cash
description:
Inflicts Air damage.

For 2 turns, inflicts Air damage if the target suffers an attempted AP reduction.
May be triggered 3 times per turn.

name: Bankruptcy
description: Inflicts Air damage and removes AP Parry.

name: Obsolescence
description: Inflicts Water damage and reduces MP Parry.

name: Vivacity
description: Heals the targeted ally and switches places with the target.

name: Last Resort
description:
Applies the Gravity state on enemies in an area of effect around the targeted ally.
If the targeted ally is an Enutrof summons, also inflicts Neutral damage on enemies in an area of effect based on the target's missing health points.

name: Shovel of the Ancients
description: Inflicts Water damage on enemies and repels the target.

name: Sieving
description:
Inflicts Water damage and removes MP in an area of effect.
Does not affect the caster.

name: Pull Out
description:
Immobilises targets and applies the Gravity state on everyone. Does not affect the caster.
Immobilises the caster on the following turn.

The effects cannot be unbewitched.

name: Lucky Shovel
description:
Summons a static Lucky Shovel.
If an enemy destroys it, the caster inflicts damage in their best attack element on the enemy.
The shovel is destroyed 4 turns after being summoned.

name: Bribery
description:
On an ally: heals the target but makes it Pacifist.
On an enemy: makes the target Pacifist and Invulnerable.

name: Decadence
description: Increases the targeted ally's final damage but increases their damage suffered on the following turn.

name: Unsummoning
description:
Inflicts Fire damage.
Inflicts additional Fire damage on summons. 
Rogues' elemental Bombs are not affected by this effect.

name: Firedamp Explosion
description:
Inflicts Fire damage on enemies.

For 2 turns, inflicts Fire damage on enemies in a 2-cell area of effect around the target if it is healed.
May be triggered 3 times per turn.

name: Living Chest
description:
Summons a biddable Living Chest that locks enemies.
It inflicts Water damage on adjacent enemies and reveals invisible entities. Its damage is greater depending on its missing health points.
When attacked by an ally, the ally is healed.

name: Living Trunk
description:
Summons a biddable Living Trunk that heals allies around it.
When attacked by an ally, the ally is healed.

name: Gangsterdom
description: Inflicts Earth damage.

name: Pitfall
description:
Inflicts Earth damage.
The damage is increased for each of the caster's traps that is triggered.
The effects are removed after the spell has been used.

name: Tricky Trap
description: Places a trap that inflicts Fire damage on enemies and attracts entities towards its centre.

name: Cut-Throat
description:
Inflicts Fire damage.
Increases the caster's and their allies' Power in a 2-cell area of effect around the caster.

name: Invisibility
description: Makes the targeted ally invisible and increases that ally's MP.

name: Mist
description: Places a glyph-aura that makes allies invisible.

name: Insidious Poison
description: Applies a start-of-turn Air poison.

name: Toxines
description:
Applies an end-of-turn Air poison on the targeted enemy.
As long as the poison is active, it can be reapplied and its damage is increased each time the target is caught by one of the caster's Sram traps.
This effect can only be triggered once per turn.

There can only be one enemy under the effect of the spell.
The poison can stack a maximum of once.

name: Insidious Trap
description: Places a single-cell trap that places an end-of-turn glyph on a 3-cell area of effect that inflicts Air damage on enemies.

name: Con
description: Steals Agility and inflicts Air damage.

name: Tricky Blow
description: Inflicts Fire damage on enemies and repels the target.

name: Waylaying
description: Inflicts Fire damage on enemies and attracts the target towards the caster's double.

name: Double
description:
Summons a controllable double that has the same characteristics as the summoner.
Does not attack and dies at the end of its third turn, switching places with its summoner.

name: Plotter
description:
Summons a controllable double that has the same characteristics as the summoner.
It doesn't attack and dies at the end of its third turn, inflicting damage in the caster's best attack element on adjacent entities.
The damage on the death of the Plotter increases with each of the caster's triggered traps.

name: Miry Trap
description:
Places a trap that inflicts Water damage.
Heals allies by up to 50% of damage inflicted on the entity that triggers it in a 2-cell area of effect around itself.

name: Larceny
description:
Steals Chance and inflicts Water damage in an area of effect.
Does not affect the caster.

name: Mass Trap
description:
Places a single-cell trap that inflicts Earth damage in a 3-cell area of effect.
Does not affect the ally that triggers the trap.

name: Shakedown
description: Steals Strength and inflicts Earth damage.

name: Cruelty
description: Inflicts Water damage and gives the caster 1 MP.

name: Drift Trap
description: Places a trap that inflicts Fire damage on enemies and pushes entities away from the centre of the zone.

name: Malevolent Trap
description:
Places a trap that inflicts Earth damage.
The spell damage is increased for each enemy in a 2-cell area around the trap.

name: Epidemic
description:
Applies an end-of-turn Air poison on the targeted enemy.
At the end of its turn, spreads the poison to enemies in a 2-cell area of effect around itself.

The caster's double can be a target to spread the poison.

The effects cannot be unbewitched.

name: Fragmentation Trap
description:
Places a single-cell trap that inflicts Fire damage in a 3-cell area of effect.
The damage is greater depending on the distance from the centre of the area of effect.
Does not affect the ally that triggers the trap.

name: Furrow
description:
Steals Intelligence and inflicts Fire damage in an area of effect.
Does not affect the caster.

name: Paralysing Trap
description: Places a trap that removes MP from enemies in an area of effect.

name: Mass Grave
description: Places a single-cell trap that applies the Gravity state in a 2-cell area of effect.

name: Mistake
description:
Erodes the targets and inflicts Air damage in an area of effect.
Does not affect the caster.

name: Toxic Injection
description:
Applies a start-of-turn Air poison. 
The spell's cooldown period is reduced for each of the caster's triggered traps.

name: Repelling Trap
description: Places a trap that pushes entities and inflicts Air damage on enemies in an area of effect.

name: Jinx
description: Steals HP in the Water element and minimises the target's random effects.

name: Fear
description: Pushes the target to the targeted cell.

name: Misconstrual
description:
Switches the position of the target and the caster's double.
Dissipates the caster's Invisibility.

name: Chakra Concentration
description:
For 1 turn, steals health in the caster's best attack element each time the target triggers one of the caster's Sram traps.
Dissipates the caster's Invisibility.

The effects cannot be unbewitched.

name: Plot
description: Increases the targeted ally's Dodge and Damage.

name: Raiding
description:
Steals HP in the Water element.
Heals allies by up to 50% of the damage inflicted on the targeted enemy in a 2-cell area of effect around the enemy. Does not affect the caster.

name: Calamity
description: Places a single-cell trap that inflicts Water damage and removes Dodge from enemies in a 1-cell square area of effect.

name: Sickrat Trap
description: Places a single-cell trap that attracts entities towards its centre and inflicts Water damage on enemies in a 3-cell cross area of effect.

name: Perquisition
description:
Pushes the target and steals HP in the Water element from enemies.
Heals allies by up to 50% of the damage inflicted on the targeted enemy in a 2-cell area of effect around the enemy. Does not affect the caster.

name: Lethal Attack
description:
Inflicts Earth damage.
The damage is greater on targets with less than 25% of their health points.

groups.title: Sur une cible ayant moins de 25% PV

name: Break-In
description: Inflicts Fire damage and reduces Pushback Resistances.

name: Lethal Trap
description:
Inflicts Earth damage.
The damage is greater on entities with less than 25% of their health points.

groups.title: Sur une cible ayant moins de 25% PV

name: Perfidy
description:
Inflicts Earth damage.
The spell's AP cost is lowered for each of the caster's triggered traps.
The effects are removed after the spell has been used.

name: Evasion
description:
Makes the targeted ally Unlockable.
For 1 turn, if the targeted ally suffers close-combat damage:
• The ally is pushed by their attacker
• Increases their MP
• Makes them invisible

The caster cannot trigger the spell's effects on themself with their traps.

name: Mortuary Mark
description:
Erodes the target.
The erosion is greater based on the number of the caster's triggered traps.
Dissipates the caster's Invisibility.

name: Slow Down
description:
Inflicts Water damage and steals 1 AP from the target.
Removes 1 extra AP from enemies in the Telefrag state.
The AP removal cannot be unbewitched.

name: Souvenir
description: Inflicts Earth damage and teleports the target back to its previous position.

name: Hand
description: Inflicts Fire damage. If the target loses the Telefrag state, it suffers extra Fire damage and Hand is removed.

name: Cog
description:
Inflicts Water damage. 
The caster gains 1 AP on the following turn.

name: Teleportation
description:
Teleports the caster symmetrically in relation to the target.
The caster gains 2 AP for 1 turn each time they generate a Telefrag.
The cool down period is removed when a Telefrag is generated or consumed.

A Telefrag is generated when one entity takes the place of another.

name: Spontaneous Return
description: The target returns to its previous position.

name: Shrivelling
description: Inflicts Air damage in a straight line; the damage is increased on enemies in the Telefrag state.

name: Drying Up
description:
Inflicts Air damage on enemies. 
If the target is in the Telefrag state, the spell spreads to the next enemy in the Telefrag state within 2 cells or less, and so on until the spell can no longer spread.
Can rebound with the Accomplice and the Dial if they are in the Telefrag state, but does not inflict damage on them.
Any given target can only be hit once per casting. 
Damage increases with each rebound, and the Telefrag state is removed.

name: Rewind
description: At the end of its turn, teleports the targeted ally back to where it was at the start of the turn.

name: Reflect
description: Immediately teleports the target to its start-of-turn cell.

name: Xelor's Punch
description:
Inflicts Earth damage on enemies.
Teleports the target symmetrically in relation to the spell's caster.

name: Gear
description: Teleports the targets symmetrically in relation to the centre of the area of effect and inflicts Earth damage on enemies in an area of effect.

name: Accomplice
description:
Summons a static Accomplice that does not have any spells.
It is killed if another caster's Accomplice is summoned.

name: Xelor's Dial
description:
Summons a Dial that removes AP from enemies in the Telefrag state in an area of effect.
Gives AP to allies in the Telefrag state around it. When it is summoned again, reapplies the AP bonus to allies who already had it.

There can only be one Dial per team. If the Dial is still alive when summoned again, the old one is killed and replaced by a new one.

name: Frostbite
description:
Inflicts Air damage on enemies.
Teleports the target back to its previous position.

name: Disruption
description: Teleports the target symmetrically in relation to the caster and inflicts Fire damage on enemies.

name: Xelor's Sandglass
description:
Inflicts Fire damage and removes AP from the target in a straight line, without line of sight.
If the target is in the Telefrag state, the spell's effect is applied in an area of effect.
The AP removal cannot be unbewitched.

name: Temporal Distortion
description:
Inflicts Air damage on enemies.
Teleports the targets to their previous positions.

name: Time Theft
description:
Steals AP from targets in the Telefrag state and inflicts Water damage in an area of effect. Removes the Telefrag state.
Does not affect the caster.

name: Petrification
description:
Inflicts Water damage and removes AP.
If the target is in the Telefrag state, the spell's AP cost is reduced for 2 turns.

name: Haziness
description:
Reduces AP in an area of effect this turn.
Increases AP in an area of effect the next turn.

name: Conservation
description: Reduces the damage inflicted by entities in the area of effect by 20%. On the following turn, the targets reduce damage suffered by 20% for 1 turn.

name: Temporal Dust
description:
Inflicts Fire damage on the targeted enemy.
Also inflicts Fire damage on enemies in the Telefrag in an area of effect, and teleports targets in the Telefrag state symmetrically in relation to the centre of the area of effect.

name: Temporal Suspension
description:
Inflicts Fire damage on enemies.
Reduces the duration of the effects on enemy targets in the Telefrag state and removes the state. Any one target cannot be unbewitched twice in the same turn using Temporal Suspension.

name: Rhol Bak
description: Teleports all targeted entities back to their original positions.

name: Temporal Instability
description:
Places a glyph that returns entities that start their turns inside it to their previous positions.
Any entities in the glyph have the Unlockable state.
When the caster generates a Telefrag, the entities inside the glyph return to their previous positions.

name: Loss of Motivation
description:
Inflicts Earth damage on enemies in a diagonal line.
Reduces the duration of the effects on targets in the Telefrag state and removes the state. Any one target cannot be unbewitched twice in the same turn using Loss of Motivation.

name: Pendulum
description:
The caster teleports symmetrically in relation to the target and inflicts Air damage in an area of effect on their destination cell.
They then return to their previous position.

name: Temporal Paradox
description:
Teleports allies and enemies (within an area of effect of 4 cells around the Dial) symmetrically in relation to the Accomplice (or the Dial).
At the start of the Accomplice's (or Dial's) turn: teleports the same targets again symmetrically.

Sets the cooldown period of Xelor's Dial and the Accomplice to 1.
The caster and Synchro are not affected by the teleportation.

name: Time Rift
description:
The caster switches places with the Accomplice (or the Dial).
At the end of the turn, the Accomplice (or Dial) returns to its previous position.

Synchro cannot be triggered by Time Rift teleportation.

name: Synchro
description:
Summons the Synchro. It gains in power and heals itself when a Telefrag is generated, once per turn.
Synchro will die, inflicting Air damage in a 3-cell area of effect if it suffers a Telefrag.
It is not affected by the effects of the Rewind spell.

name: Twenty-Fifth Hour
description:
Reduces the cooldown period for the following spells to 0: 
Teleportation, Rewind, Reflect, Dial, Haziness, Conservation, Rhol Bak, Instability, Paradox, Rift, Counter, Temporal Oop Shield, Premonition, Mummification, and Knell.

Increases the number of casts per turn for the following spells by 1: 
Spontaneous Return, Accomplice, Flight, Embalming, and Desynchro.

name: Counter
description: Reflects part of the damage taken in close-combat back at the attacker.

name: Temporal Oop Shield
description: If the target suffers damage, it and its attacker return to their previous positions.

name: Flight
description: At the start of caster's next turn, teleports the target to their previous position. Increases allies' Dodge for 1 turn.

name: Premonition
description:
Places a rune that teleports the caster or switches their place with the entity on the targeted cell at the start of their next turn.
Generates a Telefrag if switching places.

name: Clock
description:
Steals Water health.
The caster gains 1 AP at the start of their next turn.
Removes 1 extra AP from enemies in the Telefrag state and removes the state.
The AP removal cannot be unbewitched.

name: Water Clock
description:
Inflicts Water damage.
If the target is in the Telefrag state, the caster gains 2 AP on the next turn.
Removes the Telefrag state.

name: Dark Ray
description:
Inflicts Earth damage in a straight line.
The base damage of the spell is doubled against enemies in the Telefrag state.
Removes the Telefrag state.

name: Shadowy Beam
description:
Inflicts Earth damage on enemies.
If the target is in the Telefrag state, inflicts Earth damage on enemies in an area of effect around it.

name: Mummification
description: The caster gains MP, AP Parry, and applies the Telefrag state to everyone except themself and the Synchro for 1 turn.

name: Embalming
description:
Applies the Telefrag state on the target for 2 turns; does not affect the caster or Synchro.
At the start of their next turn, the caster loses 1 AP for each time the spell is cast.
On allies, increases AP Parry for 2 turns.

name: Desynchronisation
description: Places a single-cell trap that teleports the entities located 2 cells or less away from the trap symmetrically.

name: Knell
description:
Inflicts Air, Water, Earth and Fire damage on enemies in an area of effect.
Damage is increased for each Telefrag generated since it was last cast.
Does not inflict any damage if no Telefrags have been generated since it was last cast.

name: Heads or Tails
description:
Inflicts Earth damage.
The spell's damage is less on the next turn.

name: Tails or Heads
description:
Erodes the target and inflicts Earth Damage.
Erosion stacking is shared with the Bluff, Reflex, and Meowch spells.

name: Balling Up
description: Inflicts Air damage.

name: Meowch
description:
Erodes the target and inflicts Fire damage.
Erosion stacking is shared with the Bluff, Reflex, and Tails or Heads spells.

name: Ecaflip's Luck
description: Reduces the targeted ally's damage suffered but increases it on the following turn.

name: Godsend
description: Heals the targeted ally but increases their damage suffered.

name: Bluff
description:
Erodes the target and inflicts Water damage.
Erosion stacking is shared with the Reflex, Tails or Heads, and Meowch spells.

name: Nerve
description: Inflicts Air damage and reduces Pushback Resistance.

name: Catnip
description: Increases the target's MP.

name: Leap
description: Teleports the caster onto the targeted cell and increases allies' Dodge in an area of effect.

name: Topkaj
description: Inflicts Fire damage.

name: Yowling
description: Inflicts Fire damage on enemies and heals allies in an area of effect.

name: Summoning Claw
description:
Summons a biddable Enraged Kitten that steals HP in the Water element.
Each time it attacks, the Enraged Kitten increases its summoner's Power. This effect cannot be unbewitched.

name: Summoning Stroke
description: Summons a biddable Healing Kitten that heals allies.

name: Perception
description: Heals the targeted ally for each enemy in the area of effect and reveals invisible entities in an area of effect.

name: Roar
description: Increases the caster's Power for each enemy in the area of effect and reveals invisible entities in an area of effect.

name: All or Nothing
description:
On enemies: inflicts Water damage in an area of effect immediately and heals on the following turn.
On allies: heals in an area of effect immediately and inflicts Water damage on the following turn.
The caster is always affected first, whether or not they are in the area of effect.

name: Peril
description:
Inflicts Water damage on summons and heals targets that aren't summons in an area of effect.
Does not affect the caster.

name: Roulette
description:
Summons a Roulette that provides a random bonus to everyone at the start of its turn.

There can only be one Roulette per team. If the Roulette is still alive when summoned again, the old one is killed to make room for the new one.

name: Spell Strike
description:
Summons a Spell Strike that gives a random bonus to its attacker when attacked.
Gives a random bonus to its summoner when summoned.

There can only be one Spell Strike per team. If the Spell Strike is still alive when summoned again, the old one is killed to make room for the new one.

name: Repercussion
description:
Applies shield points on the target but reduces their damage inflicted on the following turn.

The effects cannot be unbewitched.

name: Corollary
description: Erodes enemies in an area of effect.

name: Rough Tongue
description:
Reduces enemies' Range and inflicts Fire damage on them in an area of effect.
Increases their Range on the following turn.

On allies: increases their Range but reduces it on the following turn.

name: Lapping Up
description:
Inflicts Earth damage and removes MP.
Gives the target 1 MP on the following turn.

name: Wheel of Fortune
description: Increases the Power of the target's spells.

name: Pussycat
description:
Heals the targeted ally immediately and then at the start of the caster's turn for 2 turns.
Healing is lower on the caster.

name: Feline Spirit
description: Inflicts Earth damage on enemies and teleports the caster symmetrically in relation to the target.

name: Pawpads
description: Moves the caster away from the target and inflicts Fire damage on enemies.

name: Clover
description:
Transfers Ecaflip's Coin's likelihood of performing a critical hit from the caster to the target for 2 turns.

Removes the effects of Ecaflip's Coin from the caster.

name: Lucky Star
description:
Heals the target.

For 2 turns, heals the target (except the caster) if the target is attracted, pushed, or swaps positions.
The healing may be triggered 3 times per turn.

name: Smell
description:
Removes unparryable AP but increases MP in an area of effect.
Removes unparryable MP but increases AP on the following turn.

The spell's AP cost is reimbursed when cast.

name: Redistribution
description: Makes the targets in an area of effect Unlockable and applies the Gravity state to them on the next turn.

name: Reflex
description:
Erodes the targets and inflicts Air damage in an area of effect.
Erosion stacking is shared with the Bluff, Tails or Heads, and Meowch spells.

name: Bravado
description: Increases the caster's Pushback Damage for each enemy in the area of effect and inflicts Air damage in an area of effect.

name: Playful Claw
description:
Inflicts Water damage in an area of effect.
On critical hits, damage is higher but drops twice as fast over a distance.

name: Misadventure
description:
Inflicts Earth damage in a ring.
If the caster performs a critical hit, the next casting also steals HP in the Earth element within the ring.
The health steal is greater if the critical hit comes from Misadventure.
Does not affect the caster.

name: Felintion
description: Steals HP in the Water element from enemies and repels the target.

name: Kraps
description: Inflicts Water damage on enemies in an area of effect and pushes targets back from the centre of the area of effect.

name: Claw of Ceangal
description: Repels the target, moves the caster closer, and inflicts Air damage on enemies.

name: Misfortune
description: Inflicts Water damage and gives the caster 1 MP.

name: Rekop
description:
Inflicts delayed Fire, Earth, Air and Water damage at the start of the caster's turn.
Damage is greater based on the delay.

Part of the AP cost may be returned to the caster based on the delay:
• 100% of damage in 1 turn: +2 AP
• 150% of damage in 2 turns: +1 AP
• 200% damage in 3 turns: no AP returned

name: Trickery
description:
Inflicts Earth, Air, Water or Fire damage.
The AP cost, damage and the attack element are modified randomly on each casting and every time the caster performs a critical hit:
• Earth: 5 AP
• Air: 4 AP
• Water: 3 AP
• Fire: 2 AP

name: Fate of Ecaflip
description:
Inflicts Earth damage on enemies, attracts, and repels the target.
For 1 turn, if the target suffers pushback damage, removes MP from the target.

name: Ecaflip's Audacity
description:
Repels the target, moves the caster closer, and inflicts Earth damage on enemies.
For 1 turn, if the target suffers pushback damage, increases the caster's Power.

name: Alternative Word
description:
Inflicts Fire damage on enemies.
Heals allies.

name: Striking Word
description:
Inflicts Fire damage.
Places a glyph around the enemy target. The glyph heals allies at the end of turn.

name: Friendship Word
description:
Summons a biddable Coney that heals allies and applies the Stimulated state to its summoner as long as it is alive.
If cast when the Coney is on the field, teleports the Coney to the targeted cell and removes all of its MP.

When the Coney dies, it places an end-of-turn glyph that heals allies, and can no longer be summoned for 3 turns.

name: Affectionate Word
description:
Summons a biddable Protective Coney that applies shield points on allies and applies the Stimulated state on its summoner while it is alive.
If cast when the Coney is on the field, teleports the Coney to the targeted cell and removes all of its MP.

When the Coney dies, it places an end-of-turn glyph that applies shield points and can no longer be summoned for 3 turns.

name: Wounding Word
description:
Inflicts Air damage.

Allies near the caster (within 2 cells) are healed of up to 100% of the damage inflicted.

name: Slighting Word
description: Inflicts Air damage.

name: Forbidden Word
description:
Inflicts Water damage.

Allies near the target (within 2 cells) are healed of up to 100% of the damage inflicted.

name: Taboo Word
description: Inflicts Water damage.

name: Frightening Word
description: Repels the target.

name: Seductive Word
description:
Inflicts Earth damage and summons a vial.
When it is attacked by an ally, it suffers half the damage and returns 100% of lost health points to its attacker.
When it dies, it inflicts damage in an area of effect.
It dies if it enters the Stimulated state.

name: Stimulating Word
description:
The target becomes Stimulated: it gains 2 AP for 3 turns.

Doesn't affect Eniripsas.

name: Self-Sacrificing Word
description:
Increases the targeted ally's Power but reduces the heals they receive.
Applies the Stimulated state on the targeted ally.

Does not affect Eniripsas.

name: Brutal Word
description: Inflicts Earth damage.

name: Pernicious Word
description:
Inflicts Earth damage on the target.
Also inflicts greater Earth damage on enemies around the target.

name: Word of Youth
description: Heals an ally and removes 1 bewitchment turn from them.

name: Defensive Word
description:
Reduces the duration of effects on the target and inflicts Earth damage.
Erodes the caster.

name: Selective Word
description: Inflicts Fire damage on enemies and heals allies in an area of effect.

name: Impartial Word
description:
On an ally: heals the target and inflicts Fire damage on enemies in an area of effect.
On an enemy: inflicts Fire damage on the target and heals allies in an area of effect.

name: Blaring Word
description:
Inflicts Water damage in an area of effect.

Allies near the targets (within 2 cells) are healed of up to 100% of the damage inflicted.

name: Resounding Word
description: Inflicts Water damage in an area of effect.

name: Preventing Word
description: The target gains shield points for 2 turns.

name: Helping Word
description:
Increases the targeted ally's Power and gives the caster shield points.
Recasting the spell on oneself in the same turn inverts and increases the effects, before setting its cooldown period to 4 turns.

name: Secret Word
description: Inflicts Earth damage without line of sight and repels the target.

name: Agonising Word
description:
Inflicts Earth damage on the target.
Inflicts greater Earth damage on enemies adjacent the target and repels them from the centre of the area of effect.

name: Turbulent Word
description: Steals HP in the Air element

name: Mischievous Word
description:
Inflicts Air damage.

Allies near the caster (within 2 cells) are healed of up to 100% of the damage inflicted.

name: Paralysing Word
description:
Reduces MP for 1 turn.
At the end of the target's turn, the target heals nearby allies (within 2 cells).

name: Life-Giving Word
description:
Increases the MP of a targeted ally in the Stimulated state.
The effect is removed if the ally loses the Stimulated state.

name: Puzzling Word
description: Inflicts Fire damage on enemies and heals allies.

name: Furious Word
description:
Inflicts Earth damage on the target and gives the target Power based on the number of enemies adjacent to the target if it is an ally. 
Inflicts greater Earth damage on enemies around the target.

name: Whirling Word
description:
Inflicts Air damage in an area of effect.

Allies near the caster (within 2 cells) are healed of up to 100% of the damage inflicted.

name: Whirlwind Word
description: Steals HP in the Air element

name: Thunderous Word
description: Inflicts Water damage and removes AP.

name: Overwhelming Word
description:
Inflicts Water damage and removes MP.

Allies near the target (within 2 cells) are healed of up to 100% of the damage inflicted.

name: Word of Silence
description:
Reduces AP in an area of effect, and reveals invisible allies and enemies. 
Allies who have the Stimulated state, as well as the caster, are not affected.

name: Sacrificial Word
description:
The heals received by the targeted ally are increased for 2 turns.
The damage suffered by the targeted ally heals allies in the Stimulated state.

name: Regenerating Word
description: The allied target is healed with a delay: at the start of the caster's next turn, and the following turn.

name: Regenerating Mark
description: Places a glyph that heals allies at end of turn.

name: Lifting Word
description:
Switches positions with the targeted ally (excluding summons) or the caster's Coney.

If the Coney is targeted, kills the Coney.
If the ally is in the Stimulated state, removes the effects of the Stimulating Word and Self-Sacrificing Word spells from the ally.
If not, applies the Unhealable state on the caster.

name: Rallying Word
description:
Moves the caster closer to an ally, then attracts it.
Requires the ally to be in the Stimulated state.
May be cast on the Coney without it being in the Stimulated state.

name: Revitalising Word
description:
Heals allies in the Stimulated state.
Kills allied Coneys.
Removes the effects of the Stimulating Word and Self-Sacrificing Word spells from allies and sets their cooldown period to 1 turn.

name: Galvanising Word
description:
Applies the effects of Stimulating Word to all allies for 3 turns.
Does not affect the caster.

name: Word of Recovery
description: Completely heals an allied target, but then makes it Unhealable for 3 turns.

name: Uniting Word
description:
On stimulated allies: all other stimulated allies give it 10% of their HP.
On non-stimulated allies: it gives 10% of its HP to other stimulated allies.

name: Pressure
description: Erodes the target and inflicts Earth Damage.

name: Fracture
description: Erodes the targets and inflicts Air damage in a line up to the targeted cell.

name: Jump
description: Teleports the caster onto the targeted cell and increases damage received by enemies in an area of effect.

name: Agitation
description:
Increases the targeted ally's MP and makes them Unlockable.
Removes some of their Dodge on the following turn.

name: Outpouring
description: Moves the caster closer to the target and inflicts Water damage on enemies.

name: Destructive Ring
description: Inflicts Air damage on enemies and attracts targets towards the centre in an area of effect.

name: Divine Sword
description: Inflicts Air damage on enemies and increases allies' damage in an area of effect.

name: Chopper
description: Inflicts Fire damage and removes MP in an area of effect.

name: Destructive Sword
description: Erodes the targets and inflicts Fire damage in an area of effect.

name: Accumulation
description:
Inflicts Earth damage.

On the caster: increases spell damage.

name: Intimidation
description: Inflicts damage on enemies in the caster's best attack element and repels the target.

name: Conquest
description:
Summons a Iop Strategist that reflects 50% of the spell damage he suffers in a 2-cell area of effect around himself. The damage does not affect the caster.

There can only be one Iop Strategist per team. If the Iop Strategist is still alive when summoned again, the old one is killed to make room for the new one.

name: Blow
description: Pushes targets from the centre of the area of effect.

name: Violence
description: Increases the caster's Pushback Damage for each enemy in the area of effect and repels targets.

name: Gathering
description: Increases the targeted ally's Lock for each enemy in the area of effect and attracts them towards the centre in an area of effect.

name: Virtue
description: Applies shield points on allies in an area of effect but reduces the caster's Power.

name: Concentration
description:
Inflicts Earth damage.
The damage is greater on summons.

name: Sword of Judgement
description:
Applies shield points on the caster and inflicts Water damage.
The damage does not affect the caster.

At the start of each turn after being cast:
• Applies shield points on the caster
• The shield and the spell damage increase
• The spell's area of effect goes from a 1-cell Cross to a 2-cell and then a 3-cell Cross

The effects are reset if the spell is cast again, or after 3 turns if it isn't.

name: Fervour
description:
Applies shield points on the caster and inflicts Water damage on enemies.
Also applies shield points to allies adjacent to the target.

name: Threat
description: Inflicts Water damage on enemies and attracts the target.

name: Friction
description:
Attracts the target.

For 2 turns, if the target suffers enemy damage:
• If the target is an enemy, pulls the target towards their attacker
• If the target is an ally, pulls their attacker towards them

name: Fight Back
description:
Repels the target.

For 2 turns:
• If the target is an enemy, repels the target if they attack the caster
• If the target is an ally, repels their enemy attackers

name: Duel
description:
Makes the caster and the targeted enemy Invulnerable at long range, applies the Gravity state on them, and immobilises them.
The caster's Gravity state is conserved on the following turn.

name: Grip
description: Makes the targeted enemy Invulnerable and immobilises them.

name: Strengthstorm
description:
Inflicts Fire damage on enemies.

Inflicts additional Fire damage on the initial target if the spell is cast on another target.
The additional damage when changing targets is greater if the spell was first used twice on the initial target.

name: Tumult
description:
Inflicts Fire damage in an area of effect. Does not affect the caster.
The spell's damage is increased for each enemy in the area of effect before being inflicted.

name: Celestial Sword
description:
Inflicts Air damage in an area of effect.
Does not affect the caster.

name: Zenith
description:
Inflicts Air damage in an area of effect. 
Inflicts additional Air damage in an area of effect based on the caster's MP: the fewer MP the caster has used during their turn, the greater the additional damage.

name: Power
description: Increases Power.

name: Prosecution
description: Erodes the targeted enemy.

name: Precipitation
description:
Increases the targeted ally's AP but removes some on the following turn.
Also applies the Hasty state on the targeted ally, banning use of weapons and the Iop's Wrath spell.

name: Determination
description:
Applies the Unmovable state on the targeted ally and reduces their damage suffered.

The effects cannot be unbewitched.

name: Castigation
description: Inflicts Water damage and reduces Power in an area of effect.

name: Endurance
description:
Inflicts Water damage and applies shield points on the caster.

On the caster: applies shield points.

name: Sword of Iop
description:
Inflicts Earth damage in an area of effect.
Does not affect the caster.

name: Pygmachia
description:
Inflicts Earth damage in an area of effect. Does not affect the caster.
The spell damage is increased after each casting for the current turn.

name: Vitality
description:
Increases the target's Vitality.
The Vitality bonus is cut in half on targets other than the caster.

name: Massacre
description: Reflects 50% of spell damage suffered by the targeted enemy onto adjacent enemies.

name: Sword of Fate
description:
Inflicts Fire damage.
Spell damage is increased for one turn on the second turn after casting.

name: Pounding
description: Inflicts Air damage and removes MP in an area of effect.

name: Cleaver
description:
Applies shield points on the caster for each enemy in the area of effect and inflicts Water damage in an area of effect.
The damage does not affect the caster.

name: Sentence
description:
Inflicts Fire damage. Does not affect the caster.

At the end of the target's turn, inflicts greater Fire damage on enemies in a 2-cell area of effect around itself.
If the initial target is the caster, normal damage applies.

name: Iop's Wrath
description:
Inflicts Earth damage.
Spell damage is increased for one turn on the third turn after casting.

name: Fit of Rage
description:
Inflicts Earth damage.
The spell's damage is increased after each casting. The damage bonus is lost if the spell is not recast.

name: Magic Arrow
description:
Inflicts Air damage and steals Range from enemies.
Increases the targeted ally's Range.

name: Concentration Arrow
description: Attracts targets towards the centre and inflicts Air damage on enemies in an area of effect.

name: Retreat Arrow
description: Inflicts Air damage on enemies and repels the target.

name: Erosive Arrow
description: Erodes the target and inflicts Earth Damage.

name: Dispersing Arrow
description: Pushes targets from the centre of the area of effect.

name: Reprisal
description:
Applies the Gravity and Reprisal states.

For 1 turn:
• If the target is an enemy: immobilises the target in 1 turn if they inflict damage on the caster.
• If the target is an ally: immobilises the first enemy in 1 turn if they inflict damage on the target.

name: Frozen Arrow
description: Inflicts Fire damage and removes AP.

name: Paralysing Arrow
description: Inflicts Fire damage and removes AP in an area of effect.

name: Burning Arrow
description: Inflicts Fire damage on enemies and repels the targets in an area of effect.

name: Repulsive Arrow
description: Inflicts Fire damage on enemies and repels the targets in an area of effect.

name: Distant Shooting
description: Increases the Range of targets in an area of effect.

name: Absolute Acuteness
description: Deactivates line of sight on all the caster's spells.

name: Atonement Arrow
description:
Inflicts Water damage.
Spell damage is increased for one turn on the third turn after being cast and again on the sixth turn after being cast.

groups.title: Chargé avec 1 boost Normal et 1 boost Critique

name: Redemption Arrow
description:
Inflicts Water damage.
The spell's damage is increased on the next turn.

name: Bat's Eye
description: Reduces Range, steals HP in the Water element and reveals invisible entities in an area of effect.

name: Crushing Arrow
description: Inflicts Fire damage on enemies and applies the Gravity state in an area of effect.

name: Critical Shooting
description:
Increases the odds of the target landing a critical hit.
With a critical hit, also increases the target's Power.

name: Recall Beacon
description:
Summons a Recall Beacon.
It switches positions with the caster at the start of the caster's next turn then dies.

name: Immobilising Arrow
description: Inflicts Water damage and steals MP.

name: Assailing Arrow
description: Increases the caster's Power for each entity in the area of effect and inflicts Water damage in an area of effect.

name: Punitive Arrow
description:
Inflicts Earth damage.
The spell's damage is increased for one turn on the second turn after being cast, and again on the fourth turn after being cast.

groups.title: Chargé avec 1 boost Normal et 1 boost Critique

name: Arrow of Judgement
description:
Inflicts Earth damage.
Inflicts additional Earth damage based on the caster's MP: the fewer MP the caster has used during their turn, the greater the additional damage.

name: Powerful Shooting
description: Increases the Power of the target's spells.

name: Tactical Beacon
description:
Summons a Tactical Beacon that can serve as an obstacle and target.
It suffers two times less damage from allies.

There can only be one Tactical Beacon per team. If the Tactical Beacon is still alive when summoned again, the old one is killed to make room for the new one.

name: Plaguing Arrow
description: Inflicts Air damage.

name: Slaughtering Arrow
description:
Inflicts Air damage.
The spell's damage is increased on the next turn.

name: Poisoned Arrow
description: Removes MP and applies a Neutral start-of-turn poison.

name: Curative Arrow
description:
Heals the target.
Increases healing received at the start of the caster's next turn.

name: Tormenting Arrow
description: Inflicts Fire and Air damage.

name: Tyrannical Arrow
description:
Inflicts Fire and Air damage.

For 2 turns: 
• Inflicts Fire damage if the target suffers pushback damage.
• Inflicts Air damage if the target is pushed.
Each element's damage can be triggered a maximum of 3 times per turn.

groups.title: Cible subit des dommages de poussée

name: Destructive Arrow
description: Inflicts Earth damage and reduces Damage.

name: Barricade Shot
description: Inflicts Earth damage on enemies and repels the target.

name: Absorptive Arrow
description: Steals HP in the Air element

name: Devouring Arrow
description:
Inflicts Air damage on enemies. Consecutive casts on the same target increase the spell's damage up to a maximum of 3 times.

Changing targets resets damage, but damages the initial enemy target even more.

name: Lashing Arrow
description: Erodes the targeted enemy and pushes back the target.

name: Withdrawal Arrow
description: Moves the caster away from the target.

name: Slow Down Arrow
description:
Removes AP and inflicts Water damage in an area of effect.
Does not affect the caster.

name: Striking Arrow
description:
Inflicts Water damage.

At the end of the target's turn, inflicts Water damage and removes AP from enemies in a 2-cell area of effect around the target.
The AP removal is stackable a maximum of 1 time.

name: Conniving Arrow
description: Inflicts Earth damage on contact with the targeted ally.

name: Abolition Arrow
description:
Inflicts Air damage.
Inflicts greater Air damage on summons.

name: Explosive Arrow
description: Inflicts Fire damage in an area of effect.

name: Fulminating Arrow
description:
Inflicts Fire damage.
Rebounds on the nearest enemy in a 2-cell area of effect.
Can also bounce off the Tactical Beacon.

The spell's damage increases with each target hit.

name: Bow Skill
description: Increases the target's Damage.

name: Sentinel
description: Immobilises the caster to increase their spell damage and Range for the current turn.

name: Tree
description:
Plant a Tree.
After 1 turn, the Tree becomes a Leafy Tree and can be used as an intermediary for casting Sadida spells (but can no longer be pushed or pulled).

name: Leafy Tree
description: Plant a Leafy Tree that can be used as an intermediary for casting Sadida spells (but can no longer be pushed or pulled).

name: Bramble
description:
Inflicts Earth damage.

On an allied Leafy Tree, also applies the Dollish Substitution state to it. This state lets an allied Block switch places with the targeted Tree and make itself Invulnerable.

On an enemy in the Infected state: inflicts Earth damage on all enemies in the Infected state.

name: Poisoned Undergrowth
description:
Applies a start-of-turn Earth poison on the targeted enemy.

On an allied Leafy Tree: also applies the Dollish Substitution state to it. This state lets an allied Block switch places with the targeted Tree and make itself Invulnerable.

On an enemy in the Infected state: applies a start-of-turn Earth poison on all enemies in the Infected state.

name: Madoll
description:
Summons a biddable Madoll that removes AP and applies the Infected state.

When an enemy in the Infected state is hit by a single-target Sadida spell: all enemies in the Infected state are affected by the spell.

The damage inflicted on secondary infected enemies can be triggered 3 times per turn.

name: Transmuted Madoll
description:
Replaces an allied Leafy Tree with a biddable Madoll that removes AP and applies the Infected state.

When an enemy in the Infected state is hit by a single-target Sadida spell: all enemies in the Infected state are affected by the spell.

The damage inflicted on secondary infected enemies can be triggered 3 times per turn.

Upon its death, the Madoll becomes a Tree again.

name: Prickly Embers
description:
Inflicts Fire damage. 

On an allied Leafy Tree: removes the Tree's Leaves (the Leaves do not come back on their own).

On an enemy in the Infected state: inflicts Fire damage on all enemies in the Infected state.

name: Mangrove
description:
Inflicts Water damage on enemies in an area of effect.

On an allied Leafy Tree: inflicts greater Water damage on enemies in a 2-cell cross area of effect.
Removes the Tree's Leaves (the Leaves do not come back on their own).

name: The Block
description:
Summons a biddable Block that will try to get in close to enemies to obstruct them.

It can also switch positions with an allied Tree and make itself invulnerable if this Tree is in the Dollish Substitution state.

name: Transmuted Block
description:
Replaces an allied Leafy Tree with a biddable Block that will try to get in close to enemies to obstruct them.

It can also switch positions with an allied Tree and make itself invulnerable if this Tree is in the Dollish Substitution state.

Upon its death, the Block becomes a Tree again.

name: Tear
description:
Inflicts Water damage.

On an allied Puny Tree: transforms it into a Leafy Tree.

On an enemy in the Infected state: inflicts Water damage on all enemies in the Infected state.

name: Rise of Sap
description:
Steals HP in the Water element from enemies in an area of effect.

On allied Puny Trees: transforms them into Leafy Trees.

name: Paralysing Poison
description:
Applies an end-of-turn Fire poison on the target.
If the target is an enemy, also applies the Infected state.

When an enemy in the Infected state is hit by a single-target Sadida spell: all enemies in the Infected state are affected by the spell.

The damage inflicted on secondary infected enemies can be triggered 3 times per turn.

name: Proximity Poison
description:
Applies the Infected state to all enemies within 2 cells of an allied doll or Leafy Tree.

When an enemy in the Infected state is hit by a single-target Sadida spell: all enemies in the Infected state are affected by the spell.

The damage inflicted on secondary infected enemies can be triggered 3 times per turn.

name: Soothing Bramble
description:
Removes MP from enemies or heals allies.

On an enemy in the Infected state: removes MP from all enemies in the Infected state.
The MP loss is less on infected enemies other than the target.

name: Repotting
description:
Teleports the caster's targeted Leafy Tree to the first cell available between the caster and it.
Plants a Leafy Tree at the targeted position.

name: Sylvan Power
description:
Replaces an allied Leafy Tree with a controllable Tree that can:
• Push a target
• Shorten the length of effects
• Heal in an area of effect (3 cells)

At the end of its turn, it becomes a Tree again.

name: Vegetal Influence
description:
Replaces an allied Leafy Tree with a controllable Tree that can:
• Attract a target
• Remove MP in an area of effect (2 cells around itself) and apply the Infected state 

At the end of its turn, it becomes a Tree again.

name: Sacrificial Doll
description:
Summons a biddable Sacrificial Doll that inflicts Air damage and applies the Infected state as it dies.

For each turn that the Sacrificial Doll remains alive, its Vitality and the damage it inflicts increase.

name: Transmuted Sacrificed
description:
Replaces an allied Leafy Tree with a biddable Sacrificial Doll that dies and inflicts Air damage and applies the Infected state.

For each turn that the Sacrificial Doll remains alive, its Vitality and the damage it inflicts increase.

Upon its death, the Sacrificial Doll becomes a Tree again.

name: Earthquake
description:
In a 3-cell area of effect around each allied Leafy Tree:
 • Attracts the targets
 • Inflicts Fire damage on enemies
• Reveals invisible entities

name: Shake
description:
In a 2-cell area of effect around each allied Leafy Tree:
 • Inflicts Air damage on enemies
• Gives the caster 1 MP per enemy hit

name: Natural Gift
description:
Shares damage among allies and heals them in a 2-cell area of effect around an allied Leafy Tree.
Kills the targeted allied Leafy Tree.

Damage sharing does not affect summons.

name: Inoculation
description:
Inflicts Air damage on enemies and applies the Infected state on them in a 2-cell area of effect around an allied Leafy Tree.
Kills the targeted allied Leafy Tree.

On an enemy in the Infected state: inflicts less Air damage on enemies and applies the Infected state on them in a 2-cell area of effect.

name: Manifold Bramble
description:
Inflicts Earth damage in an area of effect.
Does not affect the caster or their summons.

name: Force of Nature
description:
Inflicts Earth damage.

On an enemy in the Infected state: inflicts Earth damage on all enemies in the Infected state.

Spell damage increases based on the number of the caster's Leafy Trees present on the field.

name: Dolly Sacrifice
description:
Inflicts Water damage on enemies.
Steals HP in the Water element from allies and summons.

If the target is an enemy in the Infected state, inflicts Water damage on all enemies in the Infected state.
Steals HP in the Water element from all enemy summons in the Infected state.

name: Bane
description:
Inflicts Water damage.

If the target is an enemy in the Infected state, steals HP in the Water element from all enemies in the Infected state.

name: Poisoned Wind
description: Kills one of the caster's Dolls to transform it into a Tree.

name: Vegetal Altruism
description: Kills an allied Leafy Tree to increase the Vitality of the caster's dolls and heal the caster.

name: Inflatable
description:
Summons a biddable Inflatable that heals in a 3-cell area of effect around it and gives MP to allies.

It also heals all allies adjacent to allied Leafy Trees.

name: Transmuted Inflatable
description:
Replaces an allied Leafy Tree with a biddable Inflatable that heals in a 3-cell area of effect around it and gives MP to allies.

It also heals all allies adjacent to allied Leafy Trees.

Upon its death, the Inflatable becomes a Tree again.

name: Aggressive Bramble
description:
Inflicts Earth damage.

On an enemy in the Infected state: inflicts Earth damage on all enemies in the Infected state.

Gives the caster 1 MP per enemy hit.

name: Plaguing Bramble
description: Inflicts Earth damage and removes MP from enemies in a 2-cell area of effect around an allied Leafy Tree.

name: Wild Grass
description:
Removes MP and inflicts Fire damage in an area of effect.
Does not affect the caster.

name: Contagion
description:
Inflicts Air damage. 

On an enemy in the Infected state: inflicts Air damage on all enemies in the Infected state.

Spreads the Infected state in a 2-cell area around affected enemies before inflicting damage on them.

name: Tree of Life
description:
Transforms an allied Leafy Tree into a Tree of Life and increases its Vitality.

For 2 turns:
• Allies that attack the Tree of Life are healed by some of the damage inflicted.
• Heals allied Sadida summons at the end of each of the caster's turns.

The Tree of Life turns back into a Leafy Tree 2 turns after its transformation.

name: Harmony
description:
Applies the Rooted state to the caster and immobilises them at the end of the turn for the following turn.
Shares damage between the caster and their dolls that are present on the field when the spell is cast.

name: Bush Fire
description:
Inflicts Fire and Water damage.

If the target is an enemy in the Infected state, inflicts Fire and Water damage on all enemies in the Infected state.

name: Voodoo Curse
description:
Inflicts Fire and Water damage on enemies.

On the enemy for 2 turns:
• Inflicts Fire damage if they suffer an attempted MP removal
• Inflicts Water damage if they suffer an attempted AP removal

Each element's damage can be triggered 3 times per turn.

On an enemy in the Infected state: applies the effects of the spell on all enemies in the Infected state.

name: Insolent Bramble
description:
Reduces the duration of effects on the target.

On an enemy in the Infected state: reduces the duration of effects on all enemies in the Infected state.

name: Paralysing Bramble
description:
Inflicts Air damage and removes MP.

On an enemy in the Infected state: inflicts Air damage and removes MP from all enemies in the Infected state.

name: Ultra-Powerful
description:
Summons a biddable Ultra-Powerful that removes MP and MP Parry from enemies in an area of effect.

It also removes MP from all enemies adjacent to allied Leafy Trees.

name: Transmuted Ultra-Powerful
description:
Replaces an allied Leafy Tree with a biddable Ultra-Powerful that removes MP and MP Parry from enemies in an area of effect.

It also removes MP from all enemies adjacent to allied Leafy Trees.

Upon its death, the Ultra-Powerful becomes a Tree again.

name: Hemorrhage
description: Steals HP in the Air element and removes Lock.

name: Desolation
description: Removes MP and steals HP in the Air element in an area of effect.

name: Nervousness
description:
Inflicts Water damage in an area of effect. Does not affect the caster.
Damage is greater based on the caster's Suffering.

name: Clobbering
description:
Sacrifices some of the caster's HP to inflict Water damage in an area of effect.
The damage does not affect the caster.

name: Attraction
description:
Attracts the target.
If the target is an ally, also applies the Perfusion state. Does not affect the caster.

The spell's maximum range increases with the caster's Suffering:
• Suffering 1 to 2: +1 Range
• Suffering 3 to 4: +2 Range
• Suffering 5 to 6: +3 Range
• Suffering 7 to 8: +4 Range
• Suffering 9 to 10: +5 Range

name: Perfusion
description:
Applies the Perfusion state to allies in an area of effect.
For 2 turns, allies in the area of effect are healed by some of the damage inflicted on the caster. This effect cannot be unbewitched.
Does not affect the caster.

name: Blood Bath
description:
Steals Lock from the caster for each enemy in the area of effect and steals HP in the Earth element in an area of effect.
The health steal does not affect the caster.

name: Torture
description:
Steals HP in the Earth element.
Entities who attack the target are healed by some of the damage inflicted.

name: Excruciating Pain
description:
Inflicts Fire damage in an area of effect. Does not affect the caster.
Damage is greater based on the caster's Suffering.

name: Immolation
description:
Sacrifices some of the caster's HP to inflict Fire damage in an area of effect.
The damage does not affect the caster.

name: Mutilation
description:
Sacrifices some of the caster's HP to increase their Power.
At the start of each of the caster's turns, sacrifices some of their HP again to increase their Mutilation state as long as the spell is active.
Casting the spell again removes the applied effects and casts the Coagulation spell.

Coagulation: applies shield points on the caster.
The shield is greater based on the Mutilation state.

name: Punishment
description:
Applies the Gravity state in an area of effect and grants shield points to the caster. 
Grants additional shield points to the caster for each enemy hit.

name: Voracious Sword
description: Summons a biddable Voracious Sword that steals health in the Neutral element and heals the caster and all their allies in the Perfusion state by up to 50% of the damage it inflicts.

name: Dancing Sword
description: Summons a biddable Dancing Sword that inflicts Neutral damage on enemies, attracts and increases the Dodge of all allies in the Perfusion state.

name: Ravages
description: Moves the caster closer to the target and inflicts Earth damage on enemies.

name: Light Speed
description: Teleports the caster to the first available cell between them and the target and inflicts Air damage on enemies in a line to the targeted cell.

name: Assault
description: Switches places with the target and inflicts Air damage on enemies.

name: Aversion
description: Inflicts Fire damage on enemies in an area of effect and pushes targets back from the centre of the area.

name: Transposition
description:
Switches places with the target.

The spell's maximum range increases with the caster's Suffering:
• Suffering 1 to 2: +3 Range
• Suffering 3 to 4: +4 Range
• Suffering 5 to 6: +5 Range
• Suffering 7 to 8: +6 Range
• Suffering 9 to 10: +7 Range

name: Fluctuation
description:
Makes the caster Unlockable and increases their MP.
If the caster is at Suffering 6 or more, also makes the caster's Swords Unlockable and gives them 2 MP for 1 turn.

The MP bonus on the caster is greater based on the caster's Suffering:
- Suffering 1: 1 MP
- Suffering 2 to 4: 2 MP
- Suffering 5 to 7: 3 MP
- Suffering 8 to 10: 4 MP

The effects cannot be unbewitched.

name: Condensation
description: Inflicts Water damage on enemies and attracts the targets towards the caster in an area of effect.

name: Influx
description: Attracts targets towards the centre and inflicts Earth damage on enemies in an area of effect.

name: Hostility
description: Inflicts Fire damage on enemies and repels the target.

name: Projection
description: Teleports the caster symmetrically in relation to the target and inflicts Water damage on enemies.

name: Thorn Crown
description:
For 1 turn, reflects 50% of damage received in close combat by the caster onto enemies in a 2-cell area of effect.
If the caster is at Suffering 6 or more, also applies the effects of the spell on allies in a 2-cell area of effect.

The effects cannot be unbewitched.

name: Pillory
description:
Applies the Unmovable state and increases ranged resistances.
If the target suffers close-combat damage, the spell's effects are removed. 
If the caster is at Suffering 6 or more, the effects of the spell can no longer be removed.

The effects cannot be unbewitched.

name: Transfusion
description:
Transfers 10% of the caster's health points to allies in an area of effect.
If at least one ally is in the Perfusion state, transfers an additional 10% to allies in the state.

name: Riposte
description:
Moves the caster closer to the target. 
For 1 turn, moves the caster closer to the targeted enemy if the caster suffers enemy damage.

The spell's range increases with the caster's Suffering:
• Suffering 2 to 4: +1 Range
• Suffering 5 to 7: +2 Range
• Suffering 8 to 10: +3 Range

The effects cannot be unbewitched.

name: Absorption
description: Steals HP in the Fire element and removes Power.

name: Slaughter
description:
Lowers the healing received by the targets and steals HP in the Fire element in an area of effect.
Does not affect the caster.

name: Decimation
description:
