Inflicts Earth damage in an area of effect. Does not affect the caster.
Damage is greater based on the caster's Suffering.

name: Gash
description: Sacrifices some of the caster's HP to inflict Earth damage.

name: Sacrifice
description:
The caster suffers damage instead of allies in the area of effect.

On the caster's Swords: kills them to transfer 50% of their remaining HP to the caster.

name: Penitence
description:
Switches places with the targeted ally.
For 1 turn, if the ally suffers damage, switches places with the ally.

The effects cannot be unbewitched.

name: Fury
description:
Inflicts Air damage. Does not affect the caster.
Damage is greater based on the caster's Suffering.

name: Carnage
description: Sacrifices some of the caster's HP to inflict Air damage in an area of effect.

name: Stase
description: Steals HP in the Water element and reduces the chance of performing a critical hit.

name: Dissolution
description:
Steals HP in the Water element and removes Dodge in an area of effect.
Does not affect the caster.

name: Libation
description:
Sacrifices some of the caster's HP to heal the caster at the end of their next turn.
The healing is greater based on their Suffering.

The effects cannot be unbewitched.

name: Blood Pact
description: Increases the caster's Vitality but temporarily sacrifices some of their health points.

name: Berserk
description:
Sacrifices some of the caster's health points and applies the Unhealable state on them to increase their spell damage.
Casting the spell again removes the applied effects but does not return the sacrificed health points.

Half the spell's AP cost is reimbursed when it is activated.

name: Jashin Ritual
description: Applies the Jashin Ritual state on an enemy target and places a glyph-aura around the caster. If the caster suffers damage while inside this glyph, they apply that damage to their target, and vice versa.

name: Retribution
description: Inflicts damage in the caster's best attack element and Neutral damage based on their eroded health points.

name: Bloodthirsty Madness
description:
Steals health in the caster's best attack element.
Rebounds on the nearest entity in a 2-cell area of effect.
The health steal is doubled on the caster's Swords.

Does not affect the caster.

name: Blow-Out
description:
Applies the Drunk state, gives 1 AP, and removes 1 MP.
Casting Blow-Out again cancels the first effects, and gives Dodge and 1 AP for the current turn.

name: Boozer
description:
Applies the Drunk state, reduces damages received, and removes 1 MP.
Casting Boozer again cancels the first effects and gives 1 MP for the current turn.

name: Blazing Fist
description:
Inflicts Fire damage.
The Drunk state is required.

name: Burning Circle
description: Inflicts Fire damage in an area of effect.

name: Debauchery
description: Inflicts Earth damage.

name: Hangover
description:
Inflicts Earth damage.
The spell damage increases each time it is cast.
The Drunk state is required.

name: Terror
description: Repels the target and reduces the probability of inflicting critical hits on enemies.

name: Consolation
description:
Attracts the allied target towards the caster and heals it.
The Sober state is required.

name: Alcoholic Breath
description:
Inflicts Air damage and pushes the target.
The Drunk state is required.

name: Numbness
description:
Inflicts Air damage and removes MP in an area of effect.
The Sober state is required.

name: Alcoshu
description: Steals HP in the Water element The Drunk state is required.

name: Hooch
description:
Inflicts Water damage.
The fewer MP the caster used during their turn, the greater the damage they inflict.
The Drunk state is required.

name: Karcham
description:
Carries the target. On second casting, throws the target onto the targeted cell.
Deactivates the carried target's lines of sight for spells.

name: Chamrak
description:
Carries the target. On second casting, throws the target onto the targeted cell. Deactivates the carried target's lines of sight for spells.

Does not require a line of sight, but the maximum range of the throw is less than that of the Karcham spell.

name: Schnaps
description: Inflicts Air damage in an area of effect and removes MP Parry.

name: Liqueur
description: Steals HP in the Air element

name: Propulsion
description:
Throws the target onto the targeted cell.
Inflicts damage in the caster's best attack element on enemies in an area of effect, and repels only enemies adjacent to the point of impact.

name: Brandy
description:
Throws the target onto the targeted cell. Heals allies in an area of effect around the point of impact.
The Sober state is required.

name: Drunkenness
description:
Summons an Attractive Barrel that attracts Pandawas in the Drunk state and enemies.
If carried or thrown: heals allies adjacent to the bearer or the point of impact.

name: Inebriation
description:
Summons an Incapacitating Barrel that increases allies' Power in a 2-cell area of effect around it.
When it is thrown, it removes MP from enemies in a 2-cell area of effect around the point of impact.

name: Stabilisation
description:
Prevents the target from being moved.
Increases resistance to MP loss.

name: Sherpa
description:
Gives Lock, and if the caster suffers a close-combat attack, they carry their attacker.
The Sober state is required.

name: Eviction
description:
Teleports the target symmetrically in relation to the caster.
Inflicts Earth damage on enemies.
The Sober state is required.

name: Nausea
description:
Moves the caster away from the target and inflicts Air damage.
The Drunk state is required.

name: Tipple
description:
Inflicts Water damage.
Applies an AP withdrawal penalty.

name: Distillation
description:
Inflicts Water damage in an area of effect and reduces Range.
The Sober state is required.

name: Stain
description:
Reduces the duration of effects on the target and the Power of enemies.
The Drunk state is required.

name: Brewing
description:
Applies the Gravity state.
The Drunk state is required.

name: Vulnerability
description:
Increases the final damages received by the target for 2 turns.
The Drunk state is required.

name: Prohibition
description:
Applies the Unhealable state to the target and makes it invulnerable to close-combat damage. If cast on oneself, the Unhealable state is applied at the start of the next turn.
The Drunk state is required.

name: Melancholy
description: Inflicts Water damage in an area of effect. The Sober state is required.

name: Pandjiu
description: Inflicts Fire damage on enemies and attracts the target 2 cells.

name: Zatoishwan's Wrath
description:
Applies the Drunk state.
Increases the caster's Damage, Power and AP.

name: Fermentation
description:
Applies shield points on the caster for the current turn and does so a second time on the following turn.
The Drunk state is required.

name: Explosive Flask
description: Inflicts Fire damage in an area of effect.

name: Absinthe
description:
Steals HP in the Fire element without a line of sight.
The Drunk state is required.

name: Vertigo
description:
Throws the carried entity and increases its Lock.
Attracts entities aligned with the targeted cell.

name: Waterfall
description:
The caster throws the target and moves closer to it.
The Sober state is required.

name: Pandatak
description: Inflicts Earth damage for several cells along a straight line.

name: Filthipint
description:
Steals HP in the Earth element in an area of effect.
Does not affect the caster.
The Drunk state is required.

name: Pandiniuras
description:
Increases the targeted ally's MP.
The Drunk state is required.

name: Stretcher
description:
Throws the target to the targeted cell. The target is healed depending on the number of entities passed over.
The Sober state is required.

name: Spirit Bond
description:
Summons a biddable Pandawasta that blocks opponents' movements.
The Drunk state is required.

name: Bamboo
description:
Summons a Bamboo.
The caster mounts the Bamboo if they attack it in close combat while in the Sober state.
Deactivates the caster's lines of sight for spells if they are carried by a Bamboo.
A Pandawa carried by a Bamboo cannot cast spells allowing them to carry other entities.
The Sober state is required.

name: Detonator
description:
Adds 1 Combo to one of the caster's Bombs and makes it explode without line of sight.
Gives 1 AP back to the caster right before the explosion.

name: Fuze
description:
Makes one of the caster's Bombs explode.
Gives 2 AP back to the caster right before the explosion.

name: Explobomb
description:
Places a bomb that inflicts Fire damage in a 2-cell area of effect when it explodes.

If the spell is cast on a target: inflicts Fire damage in a 2-cell area of effect on the target.
If the target is one of the caster's bombs: adds 1 Combo to the bomb and makes it explode.

The spell's AP cost increases by 1 for each of the caster's Explobombs present on the field.

name: Resilient Explobomb
description:
Places a bomb that inflicts Fire damage in a 2-cell area of effect when it explodes.

If the spell is cast on a target: inflicts Fire damage in a 2-cell area of effect on the target.
If the target is one of the caster's bombs, adds 1 Combo to the bomb and makes it explode.

A Resilient Bomb has 40% more HP than a regular Bomb.

name: Grenado
description:
Places a Bomb that inflicts Air damage and removes MP in a 2-cell area of effect when it explodes.

If the spell is cast on a target: inflicts Air damage and removes MP in a 2-cell area of effect on the target.
If the target is one of the caster's bombs: adds 1 Combo to the bomb and makes it explode.

The spell's AP cost increases by 1 for each of the caster's Grenados present on the field.

name: Resilient Grenado
description:
Places a Bomb that inflicts Air damage and removes MP in a 2-cell area of effect when it explodes.

If the spell is cast on a target: inflicts Air damage and removes MP in a 2-cell area of effect on the target.
If the target is one of the caster's bombs, adds 1 Combo to the bomb and makes it explode.

A Resilient Bomb has 40% more HP than a regular Bomb.

name: Kickback
description:
Applies shield points to the caster's Bombs and pushes them from the centre of the area of effect.
The closer the spell is cast to one of the caster's Bombs, the more it is pushed.
May be used on the Megabomb or the Walking Bomb.

Pushes other entities one cell only.
Does not affect the caster.

name: Ruse
description:
Applies shield points to one of the caster's Bombs then moves them closer to it.
May be used on the Megabomb or the Walking Bomb.

name: Pulsar
description:
Inflicts Fire damage on enemies and repels the targets in an area of effect.
Does not affect the caster.

name: Obliteration
description:
Inflicts Fire damage. 
Damage is increased based on the number of Explobombs or Sticky Bombs that have exploded since the last time Obliteration was cast.

name: Magnet
description:
Adds 1 Combo once per Bomb per turn in an area of effect. Does not affect the centre cell.
Attracts the caster's Bombs in the area of effect towards the target. The Combo is only applied if the Bombs are effectively moved.
May be used on the Megabomb or the Walking Bomb.

Attracts other entities one cell only.
Does not affect the caster.

name: Crossing
description:
Adds 1 Combo once per Bomb per turn in an area of effect. Does not affect the centre cell.
Attracts the caster's Bombs in the area of effect towards the targeted cell. The Combo is only applied if the Bombs are effectively moved.
May be used on the Megabomb or the Walking Bomb.

name: Carbine
description: Inflicts Air damage on enemies and repels targets in an area of effect.

name: Machine Gun
description: Inflicts Air damage and removes MP in an area of effect.

name: Dirty Trick
description:
Adds 1 Combo to one of the caster's Bombs, switches positions with it and applies the Gravity to it.
The effects are only applied if the position switch can occur.
May be used on the Megabomb.

name: Walking Bomb
description:
Summons a controllable Bomb that can obtain an element by targeting an elemental Bomb.
It dies to place a Bomb in the corresponding element at the end of its turn.
It dies after 2 turns if it has not obtained any elements.

name: Seismobomb
description:
Places a bomb that inflicts Earth damage in a 2-cell area of effect when it explodes.

If the spell is cast on a target: inflicts Earth damage in a 2-cell area of effect on the target.
If the target is one of the caster's bombs: adds 1 Combo to the bomb and makes it explode.

The spell's AP cost increases by 1 for each of the caster's Seismobombs present on the field.

name: Resilient Seismobomb
description:
Places a bomb that inflicts Earth damage in a 2-cell area of effect when it explodes.

If the spell is cast on a target: inflicts Earth damage in a 2-cell area of effect on the target.
If the target is one of the caster's bombs, adds 1 Combo to the bomb and makes it explode.

A Resilient Bomb has 40% more HP than a regular Bomb.

name: Water Bomb
description:
Places a Bomb that inflicts Water damage and removes AP in a 2-cell area of effect when it explodes.

If the spell is cast on a target: inflicts Water damage and removes AP in a 2-cell area of effect on the target.
If the target is one of the caster's bombs: adds 1 Combo to the bomb and makes it explode.

The spell's AP cost increases by 1 for each of the caster's Water Bombs present on the field.

name: Resilient Water Bomb
description:
Places a Bomb that inflicts Water damage and removes AP in a 2-cell area of effect when it explodes.

If the spell is cast on a target: inflicts Water damage and removes AP in a 2-cell area of effect on the target.
If the target is one of the caster's bombs, adds 1 Combo to the bomb and makes it explode.

A Resilient Bomb has 40% more HP than a regular Bomb.

name: Boombot
description:
Summons a controllable robot capable of pushing, attracting or trigger the caster's Bombs.
The robot dies at the end of its turn.

name: Megabomb
description:
Summons a controllable Megabomb that inflicts Neutral damage.
Its damage increases each time it devours a Bomb. It loses 1 MP per bomb devoured.
When it dies, it explodes and adds 1 Combo to the caster's Bombs and causes them to explode in a 2-cell area of effect around it.

The Megabomb is vulnerable to bomb walls.

name: Bombard
description: Inflicts Earth damage on enemies and repels the targets in an area of effect.

name: Weigh Down
description:
Inflicts Earth damage.
On one of the caster's Bombs: inflicts Earth damage on entities located between two aligned Bombs.
Affected Bombs gain 1 Combo, once per Bomb per turn.
Requires targeting a Bomb, Walking Bomb or Megabomb.

name: Stolen Goods
description: Inflicts Water damage on enemies and attracts the target.

name: Shrapnel
description:
Inflicts Water damage.
Removes 1 AP (3 max) for each of the caster's Bombs, Megabombs or Walking Bombs adjacent to the targeted enemy.

name: Roguery
description:
Applies non-dissipable shield points on all the caster's Bombs.
Shield points are also applied on their Megabomb and Walking Bomb.

Creates several images of the caster to trick their opponents, and allows the caster to teleport. The images disappear if they suffer damage.
Ends the caster's current turn.

name: Strategy
description:
Applies shield points on one of the caster's Bombs and teleports it to its previous position.
These effects are not applied if the Bomb is in one of the following states: Rooted, Gravity or Unmovable.
May be used on the Megabomb or the Walking Bomb.

name: Extraction
description:
Steals HP in the Fire element.
The health steal is reduced by half on allies.

name: Cadence
description:
Inflicts Air damage.
Removes 1 MP (3 max) for each of the caster's Bombs, Megabombs or Walking Bombs adjacent to the targeted enemy.

name: Remission
description:
Pushes back entities that attack the target in close combat.

If cast on one of the caster's Bombs: reduces long-range damage suffered.
May be used on the Megabomb or the Walking Bomb.

name: Bunker
description:
Makes one of the caster's bombs Invulnerable.
May be used on the Megabomb or the Walking Bomb.

name: Boomerang Daggers
description: Erodes the targets and inflicts Air damage in an area of effect.

name: Blunderbuss
description: Erodes the targets and inflicts Water damage in an area of effect.

name: Powder
description:
Applies the Unmovable state to one of the caster's Bombs.
Adds 2 Combos to the Bomb and causes it to explode if it dies.

The effects are removed if the Bomb is triggered by an explosion effect.

name: Sticky Bomb
description:
Places a sticky bomb on the target. The Bomb may be activated by activation spells or bomb explosions.

When activated, it inflicts damage in the caster's best attack element in a 2-cell area of effect.

A Sticky Bomb cannot be applied to an allied Bomb, Megabomb or Walking Bomb.

name: Arquebus
description: Reduces the duration of effects on the target and inflicts Earth damage on enemies.

name: Shot Pellets
description:
Steals HP in the Fire element in an area of effect.
The health steal is reduced by half on allies.

name: Last Breath
description:
Reduces the caster's maximum Vitality to temporarily add 3 Combos to their Bombs.

The spell's effects cannot be unbewitched.

name: Magnetic Trap
description: Places a single-cell trap that attracts the targets, adds 1 Combo to the caster's bombs, and causes them to explode in a 3-cell area of effect.

name: Deception
description:
Inflicts Water damage and removes AP in the area of effect.
Does not affect the caster.

name: Musket
description:
Inflicts Earth damage.
Adds 1 Combo to the caster's Bombs adjacent to the target, once per Bomb per target.

name: Kaboom
description:
Applies the Kaboom state on allies in an area of effect (see Class Mechanics).

On caster's Bombs: adds 1 Combo.

name: Imposture
description:
Switches places with the target.

If the target is an ally: applies the Kaboom state on the caster and the targeted ally for 1 turn (see Class Mechanics).
If the target is one of the caster's Bombs: adds 1 Combo to the bomb and applies the Kaboom state on the caster.

The Combo or the Kaboom state is only applied if the position switch can occur.

name: Coward Mask
description:
Applies the Coward Mask.
Increases the MP of the caster and adjacent allies.

name: Poltroon Mask
description:
Applies the Poltroon Mask.
Increase the long-range damage of the caster and adjacent allies.

name: Martelo
description:
Steals HP in the Earth element.
Applies a Dodge penalty.

name: Catalepsy
description: Steals life in the Earth element and subtracts MP from the target.

name: Picada
description: Inflicts Air damage and removes AP.

name: Agular
description: Inflicts Air damage in an area of effect.

name: Intrepid Mask
description:
Applies the Intrepid Mask. 
Reduces the damage suffered by the caster and adjacent allies.

name: Tireless Mask
description:
Applies the Tireless Mask.
Increases the AP of the caster and adjacent allies.

name: Shove Off
description:
Inflicts Air, Fire, Earth and Water damage on enemies.
Moves the caster away from the target.

name: Pivot
description: Teleports to behind the target.

name: Psychopath Mask
description:
Applies the Psychopath Mask.
Increases the close-combat damage of the caster and adjacent allies.

name: Hysterical Mask
description:
Applies the Hysterical Mask. 
At the end of their turn, the caster inflicts Neutral damage around them. The less health the caster has, the greater the damage.

name: Furia
description:
Inflicts Earth damage on enemies.
Increases the caster's damage for 2 turns.

name: Cavalcade
description: Inflicts Air damage and moves the caster closer to the target.

name: Capering
description:
Teleports to the targeted cell.
Inflicts Air damage in a cross-shaped AoE.

name: Purgatorio
description: Inflicts Fire damage on enemies and removes 1 turn of bewitchment.

name: Tortoruga
description:
Applies a shield around the target.
The shield's value is halved on Summons.

name: Armadur
description: Increases the target's MP and Dodge.

name: Bling
description: Brings the caster closer to the target.

name: Scudo
description:
Applies a shield around the target.
The shield's value is halved on Summons.

name: Distance
description: Deals Water damage to enemies and pushes the target back in a straight line.

name: Apathy
description:
Inflicts Earth damage.
Removes MP.

name: Plastron
description:
Applies a shield around the caster and their allies in the area of effect.
The shield's value is halved on Summons.

name: Ginga
description: Applies the Unmovable state and reduces close-combat damage.

name: Ardour
description: Makes the target immune to Lock, but makes it Unhealable.

name: Neurosis
description: Applies the Gravity state to the target and increases its Power.

name: Stampede
description: Teleports over a short distance and increases MP.

name: Comedy
description: Repels the target 4 cells, then attracts it 2 cells.

name: Decoy
description:
Steals life in the Water element from enemies.
Attracts the target in a straight line.

name: Bocciara
description: Inflicts Water damage and increases the caster's Pushback damage.

name: Parafuso
description: Steals Fire life and reduces the target's Power.

name: Ponteira
description: Inflicts Water damage and reduces the target's damage.

name: Trance
description:
Temporarily decreases the caster's HP.
Applies a shield around allies.
The shield's value is halved on Summons.

name: Masquerade
description:
Inflicts Neutral damage on the caster and the target.
The higher the life of the caster, the more damage will be inflicted.

name: Apostasy
description: Inflicts Fire damage and repels the caster from the target.

name: Brincaderia
description: Inflicts Fire damage and reduces the target's Range.

name: Transfiguration
description:
Applies an effect on the target based on the mask that the caster is wearing.
- The Intrepid and Tireless masks reduce damage inflicted in close combat.
- The Coward and Poltroon masks reduce damage inflicted from a distance. 
- The Psychopath and Hysterical masks reduce healing received.

Each mask change reduces the cooldown period by 1 turn.

name: Carnavalo
description:
Inflicts damage in the best element, pushes the target, and applies shield on the caster. The mask being worn increases the effect associated with it. 
- The Intrepid and Tireless masks increase shield. 
- The Coward and Poltroon masks increase pushback. 
- The Psychopath and Hysterical masks increase damage. 

Each mask change reduces the cooldown period by 1 turn.

name: Boliche
description:
Inflicts Water damage on enemies.
Pushes the target back and moves the caster closer.

name: Inferno
description: Inflicts Fire damage and increases the caster's Power.

name: Retention
description:
Steals Air health.
Reduces AP.

name: Ronda
description: Inflicts Earth damage on enemies in an area of effect and attracts the targets towards the caster.

name: Grimace
description:
Summons a biddable Grimacing Mask that locks enemies.
While alive, the Grimacing Mask shares its damage with the caster.
When an enemy leaves the Grimacing Mask's lock zone while losing AP or MP, the caster and the Mask gain 20% of the caster's HP.
If the Mask is still alive when the spell is recast, the old one is killed and replaced by a new one.

name: Diffraction
description:
Applies a shield to all allies and enemies based on their distance from the caster:
- 0 to 5 cells, 450% of level as shield 
- 6 to 11 cells, 250% of level as shield 
- 12 or more cells, 50% of level as shield 

The shield's value is halved on summons.

name: Pilfer
description: Steals Fire HP in a diagonal line.

name: Scuttle
description: Inflicts Fire damage.

name: Anchor
description: Inflicts Earth damage.

name: Mooring
description: Inflicts Earth damage.

name: Harpooner
description: Places an attack turret that steals Water, Earth, Air or Fire health from all enemies and allies within range.

name: Trawler
description:
Places a Turret that attracts entities in an area of effect around it and that can lock.
In Evolution III, it can remove MP from targets in the Spyglass state.

name: Evolution
description:
Makes the targeted Turret evolve.
Heals the targeted Turret if it receives an evolution.
Increases targeted allies' Power.

name: Transition
description:
Makes the targeted Turret evolve.
Heals the targeted Turret if it receives an evolution.
Increases targeted allies' Power.

name: Torrent
description: Inflicts Water damage on enemies and attracts the target.

name: Harmattan
description: Inflicts Air damage on the target and reduces its Pushback resistance.

name: Salt Armour
description:
Reduces ranged damage suffered by the targeted ally. The reduction is greater on the caster's Turrets. 
Puts Turrets in the Unmovable state.

name: Assistance
description:
Teleports the allied target to the first cell available between the caster and it. 
If it is one of the caster's Turrets, it is healed.

name: Scaphander
description: Increases the caster's and targeted allies' MP, damage and pushback damage.

name: Armour-Plating
description: Applies Shield points on allies. Shield points are greater on turrets.

name: Lifesaver
description:
Places a defence turret which will heal all allies and enemies within its area of effect. 
Heals given are proportionate to the targets' maximum health.

name: Drill
description:
Places a Turret that inflicts damage.
In Evolution III, it applies Erosion to targets in the Ambush state.

name: Backwash
description: Inflicts Earth damage on enemies and repels the target.

name: Surge
description: Inflicts Fire damage and applies a damage penalty to the target.

name: Tide
description: Switches places with the target and inflicts Air damage on enemies.

name: Corrosion
description: Inflicts Air damage and removes MP.

name: Vapour
description: Inflicts Fire damage in an area of effect and reduces the chance of inflicting critical hits.

name: Valve
description: Inflicts Fire damage on enemies and increases the caster's Heals.

name: Grapnel
description: Moves the caster closer to the targeted ally. The distance moved is greater on the caster's Turrets.

name: Hypertension
description:
Applies the Evolution III state to the targeted Turret, but kills it at the end of its turn.
Sets this Turret's recast interval to 1 turn.

name: Tacturret
description: Places a tactical turret which will push back enemies and allies.

name: Bathyscaphe
description:
Places a Turret that gives Shield to nearby targets.
In Evolution III, it can give 2 AP to targets in the First Aid state.

name: Spyglass
description:
Inflicts Water damage on enemies.
Applies the Spyglass state on the target so that it can be targeted by the Tacturret's special spell.
Increases the allied target's range.

name: Periscope
description: Inflicts Water damage without line of sight and applies the Spyglass state.

name: First Aid
description:
Heals the target.
Applies the First Aid state on the targeted ally so that it can be targeted by the Lifesaver's special spell.

name: Rescue
description: Heals the target and applies the First Aid state.

name: Torpedo
description: Inflicts Air damage on enemies and repels the target.

name: Short-Circuit
description:
Kills the caster's targeted turret and inflicts Air damage in an area of effect.
Sets the destroyed turret's cooldown period to 1 turn.

name: Ambush
description:
Inflicts Fire, Water, Air and Earth damage.
Applies the Ambush state on the target so it can be targeted by the Harpooner's special spell.

name: Sonar
description:
Applies the Ambush state on the targeted enemy and repels entities in a 2-cell area of effect around the target.
Does not affect the caster.

name: Dreadnaut
description:
On allies: Applies the Dreadnaut state and immunises them against damage inflicted by the Harpooner, the Drill and the Short-Circuit spell, as well as against movement by the Tacturret and the Trawler.

On enemies: applies the Corselet state and immunises them against heals from the Lifesaver and against the Bathyscaphe's shields.

name: Covering
description:
On allies: Applies the Dreadnaut state and immunises them against damage inflicted by the Harpooner, the Drill and the Short-Circuit spell, as well as against movement by the Tacturret and the Trawler.

On enemies: applies the Corselet state and immunises them against heals from the Lifesaver and against the Bathyscaphe's shields.

name: Breakwater
description:
Allows the targeted Turret to protect allies near it for 2 turns.
Close-combat damage suffered by allies is transferred to the Turret.

name: Compass
description:
Switches the positions of the two targeted entities.
Also works with turrets.

name: Froth
description: Inflicts Water damage on enemies and repels the targets in an area of effect.

name: Nautilus
description: Inflicts Water damage and removes MP.

name: Trident
description:
Inflicts Earth damage. 
Inflicts extra Earth damage when the target takes pushback damage, maximum 3 times per turn.

name: Seizing
description: Inflicts Earth damage on enemies in an area of effect.

name: Piston
description: Repels the targeted ally. The push is greater on turrets.

name: Recursiveness
description:
Repels the target.

If the target ends its movement next to an allied turret, the turret teleports it symmetrically and reapplies the spell's effect on it.

If the caster casts the spell on themself, they also move with the turrets if they are adjacent to one of them.

name: Portal
description:
Places a portal.
When several portals are active, you can use them to teleport, or to project spells.
Portals increase projected spells' damage and healing.
Enemies (excluding Summons) cannot move through a portal during the first turn in the game.

name: Flexible Portal
description:
Places a portal.
When several portals are active, you can use them to teleport, or to project spells.
Portals increase projected spells' damage and healing.
Enemies (excluding Summons) cannot move through a portal during the first turn in the game.

name: Insult
description:
Inflicts Air damage on enemies. 
If the spell is cast through a portal, also removes lock from the enemies hit.

name: Contempt
description: Inflicts Air damage and attracts the target.

name: Affliction
description: Inflicts Water damage.

name: Tribulation
description: Inflicts Water damage.

name: Shock
description:
Inflicts Earth damage to enemies in a cross.
Draws targets towards the targeted cell.

name: Convulsion
description: Inflicts Earth damage on enemies and repels the target.

name: Wakfu Ray
description:
Inflicts Fire damage on enemies in a straight line.
Heals allies.

name: Lazybeam
description:
Inflicts Fire damage.
If the spell is cast through a portal, steals HP in the Fire element.

name: Neutral
description: Deactivates an allied Portal for 1 turn.

name: Interruption
description: Deactivates all allied portals.

name: Offence
description: Inflicts Fire damage.

name: Affront
description: Inflicts Fire damage only if the spell is cast through a portal.

name: Stretching
description:
Temporarily reduces the caster's HP but increases the targeted ally's range.
Increases the range of the Portal spell.

name: Contraction
description: Places and activates a portal on an occupied cell.

name: Therapy
description: Attracts the target and inflicts Earth damage on enemies.

name: Snub
description:
Inflicts Earth damage on enemies.
If the spell is cast through a portal, removes a turn of bewitchment. Any one target cannot be unbewitched twice in the same turn using Snub.

name: Distribution
description: When the target suffers spell damage, the allies near the target (within 2 cells) are healed of part of the damage inflicted.

name: Diffusion
description: The target reflects 35% of damage suffered in an area of effect.

name: Stupor
description: Places a trap that summons an active portal when triggered.

name: Distortion
description:
Summons a totem that places and activates a portal on its attacker's cell when it is attacked by an ally.
As long as the totem is alive, allies that pass through portals get healed.

name: Bullying
description: Inflicts Air damage and pushes targets.

name: Sermon
description: Repels the target then inflicts Air damage on enemies.

name: Healing
description: An area-of-effect heal.

name: Conjuration
description: For 2 turns, whenever the target goes through a portal, or if the spell is cast directly through a portal, the target suffers 30% additional damage on the next attack received.

name: Lightning Fist
description:
Inflicts Water damage on enemies and repels the target.
If the spell is cast through a portal, repels further.

name: Insolence
description: Inflicts Water damage on enemies. If the spell is cast through a portal, moves the caster 2 cells away from that portal.

name: Odyssey
description: Moves the caster away from the target and brings the target closer to the caster.

name: Exodus
description: Teleports the caster symmetrically in relation to the target.

name: Curative Palm
description:
Heals the target. 
If the spell is cast through a portal, the target is healed even more.

name: Cabal
description:
Increases the targeted allies' MP.
If the spell is cast through a portal, the MP bonus is increased.

name: Audacious
description: Inflicts Water damage without line of sight.

name: Composure
description: Inflicts Water damage only if the spell is cast through a portal.

name: Focus
description:
The allied target gains Power.
If the spell is cast through a portal, the Power bonus is increased.

name: Conflagration
description:
Heals the targeted ally.
Reduces the damage inflicted by enemies near the targeted ally.

name: Parasite
description:
Inflicts Fire damage.
If the spell is cast through a portal, also applies an end-of-turn Fire poison.

groups.title: Dommages en fin de tour de la cible

name: Virus
description:
Inflicts Fire damage in an area of effect.
Allies in the area of effect are healed of up to 50% of the damage inflicted on enemies.
Does not affect the caster.

name: Sinecure
description:
Inflicts Air damage.
If the spell is cast through a portal, applies a resistance penalty to pushback damage.

name: Ridicule
description:
Inflicts Air damage.
If the spell is cast through a portal, removes MP.

name: Sarcasm
description:
Inflicts Earth damage. 
If the spell is cast through a portal, reduces the chance of Critical Hits.

name: Persiflage
description:
Inflicts Earth damage.
If the spell is cast through a portal, removes range.

name: Mutual Assistance
description:
For 2 turns, everyone in the area around the caster is healed every time an ally goes through a portal.
The caster gets 1 AP every time an enemy goes through a portal.

name: Coalition
description:
Increases an ally's AP.
If the spell is cast through a portal, the AP bonus is increased.

name: Ether
description:
Inflicts Air damage and applies the Air state. Places an Air rune at the target's location.

Based on the target's elemental state, it will undergo the following effects:
• Water: -15% damage (1 turn)
• Fire: -3 AP (1 turn)
• Earth: steals 3 Range (1 turn)

name: Stinger
description:
Inflicts Earth then Water damage and applies the Earth then Water states. 
Places a Water Rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Water: -3 MP (1 turn)
• Air: steals 3 Range (1 turn)
• Fire: +15% damage suffered (1 turn)

name: Telluric Wave
description:
Inflicts Earth damage and applies the Earth state.
Places an Earth rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Air: steals 3 Range (1 turn)
• Water: -3 MP (1 turn)
• Fire: +15% damage suffered (1 turn)

name: Cataract
description:
Inflicts Water then Fire damage and applies the Water then Fire states. 
Places a Fire rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Fire: -60 Dodge (1 turn)
• Air: -15% damage inflicted (1 turn)
• Earth: -3 MP (1 turn)

name: Runification
description:
Triggers all elemental runes: they inflict damage, give their elemental state and improve the caster's characteristics.
Can generate elemental combinations.

name: Manifestation
description:
Triggers the targeted rune.
If the cell is empty, summons a Manifestation for 1 turn:
• Water: entities 3 cells or less away from the Manifestation are attracted by 3 cells.
• Air: entities 3 cells or less away from the Manifestation are teleported symmetrically.
• Fire: the caster switches places with the Manifestation.
• Earth: entities 3 cells or less away from the Manifestation are repelled by 3 cells.
When it dies, applies its elemental state 3 cells around it.

name: Flamethrower
description:
Inflicts Fire damage and applies the Fire state. Places a Fire rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Water: -60 Dodge (1 turn)
• Air: -3 AP (1 turn)
• Earth: +15% damage suffered (1 turn)

name: Celestial Wave
description:
Inflicts Air then Earth damage and applies the Air then Earth states. 
Places an Earth rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Water: -15% damage (1 turn)
• Earth: steals 3 Range (1 turn)
• Fire: -3 AP (1 turn)

name: Stalagmite
description:
Inflicts Water damage and applies the Water state. Places a Water Rune at the target's location.

Based on the target's elemental state, it will undergo the following effects:
• Air: -15% damage (1 turn)
• Fire: -60 Dodge (1 turn)
• Earth: -3 MP (1 turn)

name: Ember
description:
Inflicts Fire then Air damage and applies the Fire then Air states. 
Places an Air rune at the target's location.

Based on the target's elemental state, it will undergo the following effects:
• Water: -60 Dodge (1 turn)
• Air: -3 AP (1 turn)
• Earth: +15% damage suffered (1 turn)

name: Elemental Drain
description:
Inflicts damage and steals characteristics in an element, depending on the target's elemental state.

Consumes the target's elemental state.

name: Morph
description:
Inflicts damage based on the enemy's elemental state, then modifies their element: Water -> Earth -> Air -> Fire -> Water
The constraints for casting the spell are modified for 3 turns, based on the initial element:
• Water: reduces the AP cost by 1
• Fire: increases base damage by 10
• Air: increases Range by 4
• Earth: Increases the number of casts per target by 1

name: Storm
description:
Steals HP in the Earth element in an area of effect and applies the Earth state.
Places an Earth rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Air: steals 3 Range (1 turn)
• Water: -3 MP (1 turn)
• Fire: +15% damage suffered (1 turn)

name: Tectonic Breach
description:
Steals HP in the Earth element and applies the Earth state. Places an Earth rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Air: steals 3 Range (1 turn)
• Water: -3 MP (1 turn)
• Fire: +15% damage suffered (1 turn)

name: Astral Blade
description:
Inflicts Air damage and applies the Air state to enemies.
Reduces enemies' Range, increases allies' Range.
Places an Air rune at the target's location.

Based on the target's elemental state, it will undergo the following effects:
• Water: -15% damage (1 turn)
• Fire: -3 AP (1 turn)
• Earth: steals 3 Range (1 turn)

name: Telluric Blade
description:
Inflicts Earth damage and applies the Earth state. Places an Earth rune at the target's location.
Reduces the probability of enemies' critical hits, and increases the probability of allies' critical hits.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Air: steals 3 Range (1 turn)
• Water: -3 MP (1 turn)
• Fire: +15% damage suffered (1 turn)

name: Polarity
description:
Attracts enemies who are in the Water state.
Repels enemies who are in the Earth state.
Switches places with an enemy who is in the Fire state.
Teleports symmetrically in relation to an enemy who is in the Air state.

Consumes the elemental states of affected enemies.

name: Quadramental Current
description:
Consumes the target's elemental state and applies a penalty to it based on its element:
• Water: 20% erosion
• Air: -30 Lock
• Earth: -3 MP
• Fire: -2 AP

name: Burning Stroke
description:
Steals HP in the Fire element in an area of effect and applies the Fire state. Places a Fire rune at the location of the targets hit.

Based on the targets' elemental states, they undergo the following effects:
• Water: -60 Dodge (1 turn)
• Air: -3 AP (1 turn)
• Earth: +15% damage suffered (1 turn)

name: Volcano
description:
Steals HP in the Fire element and applies the Fire state. Places a Fire rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Water: -60 Dodge (1 turn)
• Air: -3 AP (1 turn)
• Earth: +15% damage suffered (1 turn)

name: Glacier
description:
Inflicts Water damage in an area of effect and applies the Water state. Places a Water rune at the location of the targets hit.

Based on the targets' elemental states, they undergo the following effects:
• Air: -15% damage (1 turn)
• Fire: -60 Dodge (1 turn)
• Earth: -3 MP (1 turn)

name: Stalactite
description:
Steals HP in the Water element and applies the Water state. Places a Water Rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Air: -15% damage (1 turn)
• Fire: -60 Dodge (1 turn)
• Earth: -3 MP (1 turn)

name: Journey
description:
Teleports to the targeted cell.
Targets between the starting and targeted cell suffer damage depending on their elemental state.

name: Runic Repulsion
description:
Repels each rune on the field in a cross-shaped AoE.
Consumes the runes without triggering their effects.

name: Elemental Shield
description:
The target gains elemental resistance.
Every time it suffers damage, it loses some resistance to the attack's element. But, the attacker enters their attack's elemental state.

Can generate combinations of elements.

name: Elemental Guardian
description:
Summons a biddable Elemental Guardian whose power increases every time a different elemental combo is generated.
It attacks in the target's element.

name: Deflagration
description:
Inflicts Fire damage and applies the Fire state to enemies. Reduces the duration of the target's effects by 1 turn.
Places a Fire rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Water: -60 Dodge (1 turn)
• Air: -3 AP (1 turn)
• Earth: +15% damage suffered (1 turn)

name: Flood
description:
Inflicts Water damage and applies the Water state. Moves the caster closer to the target.
Places a Water Rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Air: -15% damage (1 turn)
• Fire: -60 Dodge (1 turn)
• Earth: -3 MP (1 turn)

name: Contribution
description:
The target gains bonuses (stackable twice) depending on the enemies' elemental states:
• Water: 150 Power.
• Fire: 240% of the caster's level in shield points.
• Air: 1 AP.
• Earth: 1 MP.

Enemies lose their elemental states.

name: Creation
description:
Places a rune on the targeted cell.
The rune's element corresponds to that of the last rune placed.

name: Icy Shards
description:
Inflicts Water damage and applies the Water state to enemies. Attracts the target by 2 cells.
Places a Water rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Air: -15% damage (1 turn)
• Fire: -60 Dodge (1 turn)
• Earth: -3 MP (1 turn)

name: Sun Lance
description:
Inflicts Fire damage, switches places with the target and applies the Fire state.
Places a Fire rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Water: -60 Dodge (1 turn)
• Air: -3 AP (1 turn)
• Earth: +15% damage suffered (1 turn)

name: Runic Treatment
description:
The allied target is healed based on the number of runes present. Healing is less on the caster.

Consumes all runes without activating their effects.

name: Runic Overcharge
description:
Consumes all runes without activating their effects.
The target suffers damage depending on the number and element of runes consumed.

name: Propagation
description:
Applies the target's elemental state to all enemies within 3 cells.
Can generate different elemental combinations.

name: Elemental Trap
description:
Places a trap that applies effects in an area of effect for 1 turn based on the targets' elements:
• Fire: the next heals received are divided by 2
• Air: removes 4 Range
• Earth: reduces the duration of active effects by 1 turn
• Water: applies the Gravity state

name: Transfixing Gust
description:
Steals HP in the Air element in an area of effect and applies the Air state.
Places an Air Rune at the location of targets hit.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Water: -15% damage (1 turn)
• Fire: -3 AP (1 turn)
• Earth: steals 3 Range (1 turn)

name: Hurricane
description:
Steals HP in the Air element and applies the Air state. Places an Air rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Water: -15% damage (1 turn)
• Fire: -3 AP (1 turn)
• Earth: steals 3 Range (1 turn)

name: Striking Meteor
description:
Inflicts Earth damage and applies the Earth state to enemies. Repels the target.
Places an Earth rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Air: steals 3 Range (1 turn)
• Water: -3 MP (1 turn)
• Fire: +15% damage suffered (1 turn)

name: Comet
description:
Inflicts Air damage, moves the caster away and applies the Air state.
Places an Air rune at the target's location.

The target's elemental state modifies the effects it undergoes:
• Water: -15% damage (1 turn)
• Fire: -3 AP (1 turn)
• Earth: steals 3 Range (1 turn)

name: Imprint
description:
Places a rune for every enemy who is affected by an elemental state.
The power of the rune depends on the level of Imprint.

name: Elemental Cycle
description:
Changes the target's element, depending on its current element:
Earth -> Water -> Fire -> Air -> Earth
The spell's AP cost is refunded, but only the first time it is cast on any given target during the same turn.

name: Tribute
description:
The caster gains bonuses based on the target's elemental state: 
• Water: 150 Power. 
• Fire: 240% of the caster's level in shield points. 
• Air: 1 AP. 
• Earth: 1 MP.

Consumes the target's elemental state.

name: Arcane Torrent
description:
For each elemental combination generated, the damage from Arcane Torrent is increased. The damage bonus disappears when the spell is cast. Does not generate elemental combinations.

Generating at least one combination is needed to cast the spell.

name: Prey
description:
The target becomes the Prey.
When attacked, the attacker is healed by part of the damage inflicted.

name: Venison
description:
The target becomes the Prey for 3 turns.
The caster and their allies inflict greater damage on the target.

name: Watchdog
description:
Inflicts Earth damage.
Damages suffered by the caster is reduced by 15% for 1 turn.

Increases Rage.

name: Jaw
description:
Inflicts Fire damage. Increases the MP Parry of the caster's and the caster's allies near the target. If the target is an ally, it also gains the bonus.

Increases Rage.

name: Ulna
description:
Inflicts Water damage.
If the target is Prey, the caster gains 1 MP.

name: Calcaneus
description:
Inflicts Water damage. 
If the target is in the Prey state, it is attracted 2 cells.

name: Carcass
description:
Inflicts Air damage.
If the target is Prey, spell damage is increased for 3 turns.

name: Stripping
description:
Inflicts Air damage. 
If the target is in the Prey state, spell damage is increased based on the number of allies next to the target.

name: Tally Ho
description:
Inflicts Fire damage.
If the target is Prey, steals MP.

name: Woof
description:
Steals HP in the Fire element. 
If the target is in the Prey state, its Pushback damage resistance is reduced.

name: Convergence
description:
On allies: gets closer to the target.
On enemies: attracts the target.

name: Tailing
description: Pushes the target back, then moves the caster closer to the target.

name: Yapper Launcher
description:
Summons a biddable Yapper that advances towards the Prey and attacks it each time its master inflicts damage with a class spell.
Its damage is increased on summons.

name: Gangrene
description:
Erodes the target.
Increases Rage.

name: Mastiff
description:
Inflicts Earth damage.
If the target is Prey, steals health.

name: Muzzle
description:
Inflicts Earth damage.

If the target is in the Prey state, the caster gains Lock and spell damage is increased based on the number of enemies adjacent to the caster.

name: Tibia
description:
Inflicts Water damage around the caster and repels.

Increases Rage.

name: Humerus
description:
Inflicts Earth damage and teleports the caster behind the target.
Increases Rage.

name: Tracking
description:
Inflicts Fire damage.
Gets closer to the target if it's Prey.

name: Hunt
description:
Inflicts Fire damage. 
If the target is in the Prey state, it is repelled.

name: Bloodhound
description:
Inflicts Air damage.

If the target is in the Prey state, attracts entities aligned with the target.

name: Beaten
description:
Inflicts Air damage.

If the target is in the Prey state, increases the Power of the caster and their allies within 2 cells of the target.

name: R-Canine
description: Reduces the caster's Rage and increases their Power.

name: Snuggletooth
description: Reduces Rage and heals the caster.

name: Protective Pelt
description:
Applies an unbewitchable shield to the target.

If the target suffers pushback damage, it loses the shield, and the caster's Rage increases.

name: Ferocity
description: If the target is moved or suffers an MP reduction, it gains Shield.

name: Carrion
description:
Erodes the target and inflicts Air damage.

Increases Rage.

name: Radius
description:
Inflicts Water damage. 
The caster switches places with the target.
Increases Rage.

name: Marrow Bone
description:
Inflicts Water damage.
If the target is Prey, spell damage is increased for 3 turns.

name: Vertebra
description: Poisons the target for 2 turns, inflicting Water damage. If the target is the Prey, the poison cannot be unbewitched.

name: Appeasement
description: Reduces the caster's Rage to heal them.

name: Affection
description:
Switches places with an allied target. Heals the caster and the target.

Reduces Rage.

name: Cerberus
description:
Inflicts Earth damage.
If the target is Prey, applies a Dodge penalty.

name: Amarok
description:
Inflicts Earth damage.
If the target is in the Prey state, reduces the damage suffered in close combat by allies around the target for 1 turn.

name: Panic
description:
Distances the target from the Prey.
If the spell is cast on the Prey, distances all entities within 2 cells or less of the target.

name: Pursuit
description: Places a glyph that gives MP to allies who move over its cell.

name: Bark
description:
The target can no longer be pushed or attracted, and gains 2 MP for 1 turn.

If the target suffers close-combat damage, spell effects are removed and the caster's Rage increases.

name: Gnaw
description:
Gives 40 Pushback damage, 80 Power and 20 Lock for 2 turns.
If the caster suffers ranged damage, they gain additional Pushback damage, Power and Lock.

name: Tetanisation
description:
Inflicts Fire damage and reduces MP.

Increases Rage.

name: Carving Up
description:
Inflicts Air damage.
Cuts in half the Heals received by the target for one turn.
Increases Rage.

name: Sniff
description:
Teleports the caster next to the Prey.
Reduces Rage.

name: Doggedness
description:
Applies the Gravity state to the targeted Prey. 
It also suffers additional damage for one turn.
Increases Rage.

name: Canine Channel
description: If the target is the Prey, 50% of the damage inflicted on the target is also inflicted on enemies around the target (2 cells or less) for 1 turn.

name: Call of the Pack
description: If the spell is cast on the Prey, all the caster's allies are pulled 4 cells towards the Prey.
